No buyers remorse, just a wonderful piece of equipment that I can see helping me in my work.I can even edit photos and slip them in to my docs just like at home. Now the hours of flight are not wasted but my own personal office.There was a learning curve for me but it has been rather fun. It does help if you have used any of their other products.

Reviews.Content: My husband really wanted an iPad.  I found this iPad on Amazon for a terrific price compared to anywhere else that I looked.  He is very happy with the product and uses it every day!

Reviews.Content: I bought this as a birthday gift for my wife.  She uses it every day, and cannot stop raving about it!  We have Apple laptops and phones, so it allows for everything to sync together.

As noted on another review, the only drawback with the Ipad is that there's no room for expansion of storage space and you cannot just watch any video off line that you want: it has to be compatible with the Ipad. However, there is a workaround to that. watch your videos from a cloud drive such as dropbox (icloud doesn't work)

I'm bummed but the contact sheet did have a number that allowed me to report the issue quickly and the customer service was polite and timely about resolving my issue.Great device, good price and a sturdy alternative to the thinner iPad air. There's no reason to buy an air this device processes very quickly and responds brillantly. A normal 64gb iPad will be about $800 newI got my device at half price! Reviews.Title: An amazing platform for browsing, media, and iOS apps!
Reviews.Author: C-Dub
Reviews.Content: I was slow to justify the cost of an iPad and despite being a long time fan of Macs, didn't really see the need for one. I found myself in a job where I am on very remote locations with quite a bit of downtime and finally decided that I could use one.I have been absolutely thrilled with this device. It is extremely stable, even with the new iOS 7 operating system. I am very happy that I chose the Retina model, because the screen is basically perfect. For everything from web browsing to watching Netflix, the quality of video and images is second to none.App performance on the iPad Retina is superb, and many of the iPad specific apps are simply mind-blowing, particularly some of the art apps like Sketchbook Pro and Procreate. I recently acquired an Adonit Jot 4, which is a pressure sensitive stylus that connects via Bluetooth, and it works like something out of the future. Just crazy good. For forum participation, writing Amazon reviews, etc., I prefer my laptop simply because I don't like typing on a touchscreen, but that's just my personal preference. I can get around on the touchscreen and if I really wanted a physical keyboard, there are several available. But that's not really what the iPad is all about. It's not there to replace your computer; it's a different type of device that excels at browsing and media consumption and is portable in a way that no laptop is.Though it takes a bit longer than I would like to take a full charge, the battery life is excellent, and I rarely find myself needing to charge when I am out and about.As a media consumption / web browsing device, the iPad Retina is ideal. The screen is so amazing that it is generally preferable to me over a larger computer or laptop screen for these purposes. I take a star off of my rating because USB connectivity would be REALLY helpful for those who would like to watch movies that they have stored on an external drive. There really is no reason that the iPad shouldn't have USB.I love my iPad, and it is so usable in this current configuration that I don't see myself having to replace it with the latest and greatest for many years.

I have some pretty big ones for gaming that i thought would take up some space but nope, still got a long ways to go. Anyhow love ipad way better than andriod for my use of it!

Reviews.Title: iPad 4th Generation Review
Reviews.Author: Nadine Cummington
Reviews.Content: I love this new iPad, it is quick, seamless, and the retina display is wonderful! When I first heard about the Retina display, I was sort of shocked by it and a bit doubtful. I thought there was no way that they can make the display any better... but I was wrong, it looks better than any still photo! It looks more real, realer. It is absolutely amazing. I got the 16GB Wifi only and have not had a problem with it once. I did get this one since I was not interested in the iPad Air that they had coming out, and I already had a 7 inch Kindle, so I was not interested in the iPad mini that was already on sale.I do not regret this purchase at all, everything on it works wonderfully, I got a Fintie case for it that rotates which is wonderful, and I must say that this iPad is the only thing in the world that is as close to perfect as anything or anyone can get. Pictures look wonderful, games look fantastic, and The Cloud works very well on this device. There is no set up time, just enter your email and password (or make an account) and that is it you are ready to use/share on The Cloud.I have to say now after experiencing Apple and their products, I now will be purchasing all their products (the products that I need) so they can all work together and accommodate one another. Right now I have an iMac and iPad and they work wonderfully together. Syncing my PC takes a bit more time, but it does indeed work. Although it is not as quick or seamless as my Apple products syncing with each other, but of course they are using the same iOS, etc. so that is understandable.This device is a masterpiece, best little computer there is, and is a absolute pleasure to have.5 stars all the way!! HIGHLY RECOMMEND!!

Reviews.Title: Problems regarding the script, ebooks, And AppStore
Reviews.Author: eneida buba
Reviews.Content: I'm just having problems with AppStore: I clicked in an app And found myself stuck in the page, I just couldn't gente out and search anymore because of that. Other thing I found annoying is to search on the web when needing the cyrillic script for example. I don't know how russians use iPad. Also the ebooks on iTunes Store are very expensive;it can't compete with kindle or nook, besides it has a bigger screen, it is much more expensive.

Reviews.Title: One of the best purchases of the year
Reviews.Author: MizLiz "MizLiz"
Reviews.Content: Love it!  Have wanted one for a while so I waited for the "honeymoon" to be over before I gave a review.  First, the retinal display is marvelous.  Pictures are so clear...photos, both those received from others and photos I take with the iPad are clear and crisp.  The keyboard is easy to use and emails and websites come up quickly.  After about a month I still have so much to learn (ie there is so much the iPad 5 has to offer). The iPad will not replace your computer.  If. I'm traveling for a week or so I can do with only the iPad.  Longer than that I feel like I have to take my laptop as well.  It's a personal preference.  Others may feel differently

Reviews.Title: As good as expected.
Reviews.Author: Péculier
Reviews.Content: Perfect. I already have an iPad 2, and I'm very satisfied with it, but for the camera résolution and sometimes the screen. With this one, the screen is perfect, and my photos are ok.

Reviews.Title: Apple IPad with Retina Display
Reviews.Author: JERRY P. HAWKER
Reviews.Content: This is a great piece of technology.  I put off purchasing on due to it does similar things as my IPhone 5 but it does them some much better and I can see the web searches!!

Reviews.Title: Wow
Reviews.Author: Fernando
Reviews.Content: I can't believe this thing cost 400 bucks.  Ill never do without it.  You will see that once you have one you will not want anything else.  And it is very well made--durable.  I have dropped it, sat on it, and nothing.  I cant wait for the next one to come out.

Reviews.Title: Ipad 4 and more!
Reviews.Author: Mike Phillips
Reviews.Content: I was very impressed with the Ipad 4, but it was for a friend. After I set it up for her and learning  basic operating skills, I turned it over to her. My kindle is fine for my needs and I recommended that my friend purchase the new Ipad because of reliability and customer service. After checking the reviews on the other pads, I felt the Ipad 4 was worth the purchase and since my friend could afford it, why not?She took a while to navigate around her Ipad and thanks to her gal friend who has the same, she should have many hours of pleasurable usage. Personally, I find it too much for me when my laptop can do all, but there are those who need all the new things and I say enjoy.

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: judith
Reviews.Content: The display is clear crisp and bright.bought for wife will buy another when the new one comes out hope it is soon

Reviews.Title: iPads for all!
Reviews.Author: D. Larsen
Reviews.Content: This is a great iPad and can make anyone a lot more productive (work) or waste your day away (leisure). There are a lots of apps, and a whole lot of great features to get you going! Love you Siri!

Reviews.Title: love it

Reviews.Content: I love this .. carry it with me to work every day so I can do my homework during lunch.. very clear and the sound is great..

Reviews.Title: NICE

Reviews.Content: Very nice item at a great price this is an item I've been looking for for a while as a gift for my family.

Reviews.Title: iPad

Reviews.Content: I love my new iPad keeps crashing tho...I have to reset it alot timely delivery and everything else is fine

Reviews.Title: Works great!

Reviews.Title: My lovely iPad

It's great with all this word carry in meanings. Screen size is just right for everything you want to do with no restrictions. Apps are for everything, games, etc.I don't think there is anything wrong with this guy, love it.

Reviews.Title: Awesome!

Reviews.Content: This is my first iPad but I love this thing.  It has taken some time and will take more to learn the functionality but so no issues.  I do have it attached to a keyboard (see my NewTrent review) so it automatically shuts the iPad off when closed so I have not had to charge it for over 4 days.The sensitivity is great when playing games or switching pages.  The display itself is simply amazing.  I know it's a bit pricy but the 128gb also leaves you without a worry of filling the thing up or having to delete anything to download or try something new.

Reviews.Title: It's Perfect
Reviews.Author: PRINCESS MONEY
Reviews.Content: Everything you love or desire about an ipad is here. I have no complaints except there is a little lag when using certain apps....but isn't that the apps fault?

Reviews.Title: Apple has done it again!
Reviews.Author: S. J. Jewett
Reviews.Content: The Retina Display is adjustable to the light in your environment.  iPad quickly downloads programs and is super easy to use!  If you're even thinking about a tablet, this is the one to purchase.

Reviews.Title: Beautiful & Fabulous

Reviews.Content: Takes awesome pictures!  Love the apps. I owned an iPad for nearly 4 years then gave it to my son and bought the kindle Fire HD.. After 4 months I sent it back and purchased the iPad 4. Oh what a feeling I so missed and do love the iPad 4,. Never gonna give you up again.

Reviews.Title: Best Tablet i've owned

Reviews.Title: it is nice

Reviews.Title: Exactly what I expected

Reviews.Title: Love it

Reviews.Title: wow,

Reviews.Title: I love it!!!

Reviews.Content: This product exceed expectation! I wanted it especially for reading book, and yes.. It s perfect! I really love it

Reviews.Title: Fast

Reviews.Content: Very fast, and that's a key reason for my purchasing. No probs at all thus far. Video out doing great.

Reviews.Title: First Ipad
Reviews.Author: Rod Stevens "Rod from Florida"
Reviews.Content: This is really a quality piece of electronics.  I must admit there is a learning curve, but if you have an Iphone, its pretty much the same setup.  Couldn't get some info from my PC transferred to my new Ipad, but technical support was very helpful.  The only thing I am really disappointed about is the fact that Apple products don't support Adobe Flash, making it impossible to download some of my favorite internet sites.

Reviews.Title: I have one so gave one to kids for wedding gift
Reviews.Author: Donna F.
Reviews.Content: I stewed over what to get them and then when I spoke with them they told me they were going to try to pick up a used iPad. Having used my 2 year old nephews older model I knew my tekkie kids would absolutely hate short the battery life so we splurged and got them this one. Best wedding gift they got! The display is fantastic and they are finding that, like me, they tend to take it everywhere.

Reviews.Title: another Apple winner!
Reviews.Author: Drew E.
Reviews.Content: I'm a "Mac Guy", so slipping into this was beyond easy! Coupled with my Snugg leather cover, it's a great "go-between" from my ipod and Mac Book. I wouldn't hesitate recommending it to anyone, and especially through Amazon!

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: kikealtamirano
Reviews.Content: Was what I wanted, works perfect and It's not heavy, helps me a lot with all my daily work at home.

Reviews.Title: Apple iPad Retina Display
Reviews.Author: Ralph Burgess
Reviews.Content: Excellant, the screen is a perfect size and very easy to use. Loved the camera feature and overall functions of the iPad.

Reviews.Title: Very satisfied with these products.
Reviews.Author: Rosemary Bell
Reviews.Content: These products exceeded my expectations.  I am enjoying the convenience, compared to my pc.  I am still learning how to use all of the functions.  I am enjoying different aspects, such as the camera and how easy it is to take a picture and immediately  send it to friends.

Reviews.Title: My wife loves it!!!
Reviews.Author: Jaianan Hirai
Reviews.Content: this was a birthday gift for my wife and she loves it so much....so far no probs....it was delivered way before estimated time...good job...

Reviews.Title: Awesome product
Reviews.Author: Satish
Reviews.Content: This is my first iPad and I got a 32 gb. Gifted it to my dearest wife. She is loving it.

Reviews.Title: The best Ipad ever
Reviews.Author: rafael
Reviews.Content: Faster, Cooler, and definitely much better than its ancestors. I have had the two previous ones and definitely love this. Great purchase!!!!

Reviews.Title: Love my iPad
Reviews.Author: Good Shopper
Reviews.Content: I really enjoy my iPAD. So glad I bought it with the wi fi.Love the white color matches mi iPhone 5.Set them both up on my Version account linked them together.

Reviews.Title: Great new iPad!
Reviews.Author: Richard
Reviews.Content: Fast, great screen and handles all the high powered apps I needed. an improvement over the original ipad.  I love it!

Reviews.Title: I was finally able to get an i-pad through Amazon.com!
Reviews.Author: V. K. Walker
Reviews.Content: I have wanted one of these I-pads since they came out, but was finally able to get one. It is so versatile and useful in many situations where using my lap-top would be difficult. I love it!

Reviews.Title: iPad

Reviews.Content: This nothing more to say for this because it speak for it self the apple iPad 4 god I'm glad I bought this baby for me for movies, games and music and I bought it for my mother for work and to keep in touch will all of us.

Reviews.Title: Great, as expected!

Reviews.Content: The IPad works great, everything was as expected. I love it! I decided yo buy the one without 3G and I think it was a good decision.

Reviews.Title: Love my new iPad!!

Reviews.Title: Excellent Product
Reviews.Author: Jerry E. Klein
Reviews.Content: First time user of the Apple iPad. Did not take long to figure things out. It also helps to have a younger person around to show you how to do some things.

Reviews.Title: The Real Tablet
Reviews.Author: Albert C. Marth "Albert c. Marth"
Reviews.Content: I am extremely happy with my I-Pad!  I replaced the Samsung tablet I purchased about 4 months ago.  The Samsung I felt was a good tablet.  I won't say I was anti Apple but I was trying to justify my reasons for buying the Samsung.  I got tired of hearing how good Apple is....how clear the picture is compared to Samsung etc.  so, I purchased an Apple I-pad.  I figured I still have my Samsung.  If I don't like the Apple I will return it and get my money back.After using my Apple for a few weeks now, I am totally sold on this product!  If fact I am considering a total change to Apple for all of my computer needs!  Next it will be a switch from my Dell desktop to the Apple 27 inch desktop.  I have been a Dell customer for approximately 20 years!Apple is a more expensive way to go, but I feel it is the best way for me.  I think Apple products are very much worth the price difference..in my opinion!Why have I strayed somewhat away from the review of the Apple I-pad!  I wanted to express my feelings about a company that I could care less about that changed because of 1 of their products....the Apple iPad with the Retina Display MD511 LL/A (32 GB, Wi -Fi, Black).  If you want total satisfaction with an iPad, the tablet is for you!

Reviews.Title: new to apple products
Reviews.Author: John Morris
Reviews.Content: It is taking a little getting used to, but does what I had hoped.  The speech app mimics a special purpose communication device that costs 20 times as much.  I think we will like it even more as we learn to use it fully.

Reviews.Title: Perfect
Reviews.Author: Paul Chung
Reviews.Content: It was in perfect condition.Everything that came along with it worked and I'm very happy with the product.Definitely a great buy.

Reviews.Title: Works great

Reviews.Title: Daughter loves it!

Reviews.Title: Great product and seller
Reviews.Author: Rick Rankin
Reviews.Content: Got product in a timely manner and in the condition requested but had problems with my lifeproof case I put on it and thought it was my ipad and instead so it took me a while to do this review because I thought my ipad was messed up. Turns out lifeproof sold me an earlier version of the case instead of the new one and it was pushing the home button in causing my ipad to shut off. Called apple and they went through all the checks and found the issue and now my ipad is great. Happy with every....

Reviews.Title: Grandma loves this.

Reviews.Content: This is a wonderful tablet.  It is extremely user friendly and I love the keyboard, especially in landscape view.Delivery time was excellent and I am giving it an all round 5 stars.Thanks Apple and Amazon for a great product.

Reviews.Title: Nice piece of kit
Reviews.Author: Pavane
Reviews.Content: This is a nice piece of kit, the screen is amazing and photos and videos look really crisp, the OS seems stable and there are countless good apps and games in the appstore to keep you busy and entertained. Email works great and internet is great on a tablet. Bit of a hefty price tag tho. I found a great book on getting started with iPads Using iPad (Computer Training)

Reviews.Title: Great Deal!
Reviews.Author: Ryan A. Schwalbach
Reviews.Content: Ipad was in perfect shape and have not found any flaws with it so far. Very happy with my selection.

Reviews.Title: Everything I need.
Reviews.Author: CPGreene
Reviews.Content: Great option with LTE, apps you need and dependability. Good resale value only adds to the benefit of owning this device

Reviews.Title: Magniicient!

Reviews.Content: Magnificient! This is the second iPad I buy. Compared to the standard screen, the large retina retina display is truly stunning, especially for reading. I know it is expensive, but we only live once....

Reviews.Title: L
Reviews.Author: renan
Reviews.Content: I love My iPad That was a great bye. brand-new in the box like Good price I recommended to everybody

Reviews.Title: Great !!!

Reviews.Content: Had iPad 2 but this one is way better, retina display is superior. Wish I bought the 128 gig one!!!

Reviews.Title: Great new addition

Reviews.Title: Works great!

Reviews.Content: I have purchased a few iPads over the years, passing along the used ones to my daughters.  They have all worked fine.  Nice tool. Nice toy.

Reviews.Title: i like it a lot

Reviews.Title: Still best tablet on the market

Reviews.Title: Great job!

Reviews.Content: I received it quickly and with no problems.I love to use Amazon for my shoppings. It is easy and secure.Excelent experence!brandao

Reviews.Title: Exactly what I wanted
Reviews.Author: NICUNurse
Reviews.Content: It's perfect for everything I need to do. My kids love to play games on it. And it's the perfect size to take everywhere..

Reviews.Title: Chrystal clear photos
Reviews.Author: Beryle Middleton
Reviews.Content: I think Apple is the premier product for our use.  It's nice and light weight.  Easy of use is very important also.  Love it!!

Reviews.Title: Awesome!

Reviews.Content: Absolutely love the retina display and glad I got the Wi-Fi + AT&T; 4G. Not at all disappointed. I would recommend it to anyone.

Reviews.Title: Great iPad

Reviews.Content: I purchased the iPad as a birthday present for my son-in-law and he just loves it, uses it all the time!

Reviews.Title: Love it

Reviews.Title: Great!
Reviews.Author: J Gordon Wilson
Reviews.Content: I new I would love it and I have not been disappointed! Amazing versatility, incredible graphics, and solid dependability.  Still the best tablet to own.

Reviews.Title: I pad four with all the goodies
Reviews.Author: Howard Barkley
Reviews.Content: I am having a hard time adapting to Apple operating system.  At 81 change comes slow, but I will make it in time.  I really like sharpness or readability of screen.  This is why I made purchase.

Reviews.Title: YES!!!
Reviews.Author: Jacqueline
Reviews.Content: Love my Apple iPad.  Could not be happier with it.  Really cannot think of any drawbacks thus far after owning it about 1 month.

Reviews.Title: Apple iPad with Retina Display (64GB)
Reviews.Author: Doug
Reviews.Content: Very handy to use.  I was an iPhone user prior to buying this, so knew the OS system, but was surprised how many iPhone Apps are different for the iPad, some not working. But i still like it and the apps area generally available. Only complaint I have is my lighting connector cord failed after a month and I am buying an new one. Not sure why it failed as there is no visible damage.

Reviews.Title: Faster and clearer than older models
Reviews.Author: Eric Flaxman
Reviews.Content: Worh the upgrade to the new processor and the Retinal display this is a clear I,prove meant over my previous Ipad2

Reviews.Title: Perfect for my girls
Reviews.Author: Fausto Macias
Reviews.Content: My girls love it, they have a tablet but they loved this one more, excellent resolution, movies are great for them.

Reviews.Title: Simply the best

Reviews.Content: I had the kindle fire hd  and returned it 4x.  My son said try the iPad.  This was the best idea.  He set it up and have not put it down since.  The movies are so clear.  The pictures look nice.  Very easy to use and for some of us, me, that makes it even better.  I am so glad I purchased this.This came a lot sooner than expected.  Now where I am so is my iPad.I say try it and I am sure you will be as pleased as I am.

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: Judy
Reviews.Content: Quick Service great package & love the product! Really enjoying the I-pad was hoping to find a better deal but didn't want to wait any longer!

Reviews.Title: iPad
Reviews.Author: Bob & Connie Wine
Reviews.Content: Struggling with battery life. Trying to figure out why battery dies quickly. Otherwise like it a lot!!!  Reading reviews & trying various ideas.

Reviews.Title: Apple iPad 64 GB
Reviews.Author: Slim Smithie
Reviews.Content: Used an iPod for three years then went to an iPhone 5 before breaking down and spending the money for the iPad.  I have a computer that hardly gets used anymore since this purchase. As long as there is a Wi-Fi close by it gets used.Even watch Netflix movies, text, play games, search web. This thing is really nice!

Reviews.Title: Good Product
Reviews.Author: Camile Bailey
Reviews.Content: I purchased this for one of my nephews and he has had no complaints.  It works as intended.  He loves it and carries it everywhere.  The retina display is brilliant and really brings the games he plays to life in vibrant, stunning colour.

Reviews.Title: Ipad
Reviews.Author: aniew
Reviews.Content: Ipad is great.  It is very light weight and does most of the functions of a laptop.  It also holds a charge for about  10 hours.

Reviews.Title: Exceeded my expectations
Reviews.Author: corbett w langdon
Reviews.Content: Changes pages very fast,has apps for anything,very good camera,very easy to take pictures and email.Am sure I will like better over time.

Reviews.Title: Great product
Reviews.Author: KMac
Reviews.Content: Easy to use.  The size is perfect. Big enough to see everything and small enough to take around.  Good for someone who has an iPhone.A little expensive though.

Reviews.Title: sweet
Reviews.Author: Pete
Reviews.Content: amazing just like when i got a new ipad2 except the camera is much better quality and the glass hopefully wont shatter like the ipad2 did

Reviews.Title: It's Great!
Reviews.Author: Cynthia Nill
Reviews.Content: I am a newcomer to iPad.  I have a Nook, and love it, and didn't think I would have any real need or use for an iPad.  However, I am loving it because there are so many more Apps for iPad than for other tablets.  I went with the "lots of memory" one because for the price difference between it and its lesser cousin (64 GB) it is worth going for the one with more memory.  Highly recommend.

Reviews.Title: Congratulations! Excelent service!
Reviews.Author: Alessandra Bourguignon Gagno
Reviews.Content: My cousin Luciana, who lives in California, came to Brazil and brought the Ipad to me.I met the site through her and I enjoyed!I indicate.Alessandra

Reviews.Title: Best tablet for me
Reviews.Author: Ben Olberg
Reviews.Content: The price point is the only part that stings, other than that Apple has the best tablets on the market.  Since we already have several apple devices and lots of apps and media purchased through itunes, this tablet made the most sense for our family.  Sharp display, snappy operating system, I'm very happy with it.

Reviews.Title: Great color
Reviews.Author: Stewart Lewis
Reviews.Content: Great color - quick response. like the camera that goes both ways. screen is very clear. speed is great. love it!

Reviews.Title: I love it, but it's not a replacement for a computer
Reviews.Author: Clint Smith
Reviews.Content: I love this product, but I hate that it does not work with Flash.We bought this thinking we could use this instead of a computer, but it's a hassle not having Microsoft Office. I'd like to be able to plug a stick drive into this, too, but it doesn't have one. Also, it can't hook up to my printer to print things.Well, maybe the iPad could do all these things mentioned above, but I'm not sure how to do it all. Also, i wish i could have multiple apps open at once. Other than that, it is fast, it is easy to use and the display is amazing. It works amazingly with the Apple TV.

Reviews.Title: Love
Reviews.Author: nathaniel house
Reviews.Content: I had been contiplating for a while to get an I pad and I am glad I finally did. Only con I can see is it can't do office docs and you can't access things on flash player. Other than that it is great for browsing and playing.

Reviews.Title: It's an APPLE product
Reviews.Author: Norman C. Bauer "stormincb"
Reviews.Content: I love the iPad, but it sure leaves a lot to imagination when you get it. Almost no written instructions, so you're expected to go on-line for how to use it etc. How do you do that with no help?

Reviews.Title: iPad is great
Reviews.Author: Brian Humphreys
Reviews.Content: This is the 3rd iPad I've owned and it performs much better than previous versions.  The retina display makes reading so much easier on the eyes.  The clarity is remarkable.  The processor also seems to be improved as the transitioning between apps is now quicker.

Reviews.Title: more of the same
Reviews.Author: WxGesr
Reviews.Content: Had Generation 3.  4 is more of the same, but better.  Completely satisfied and recommend the product.  Believe the black is more business like appearing than the white.

Reviews.Title: Apple IPAD with Retina Display
Reviews.Author: CathyK
Reviews.Content: This IPAD is very lightweight, easy to use and fun!  It takes great pictures and I'm able to watch movies downloaded from Netflix with no problem.

Reviews.Title: iPad Fourth Generation with 64GB Memory and Wi-Fi
Reviews.Author: John K. Wiebe "Kirk Wiebe"
Reviews.Content: Well made, elegant, and both my wife and I find it very, very easy to use.  With the right apps (readily available), it nicely replaces her laptop.

Reviews.Title: Even better than expected
Reviews.Author: B
Reviews.Content: As a previous android user, I was against apple products. BUT I am so very glad I made the switch!!! I couldn't be happier with the IPad and Iphone products. They are very user friendly and super convienent.I purchased the IPad through Amazon and am very very happy about it. It arrived quickly and was packed securely. It is also very easy to set up myself

Reviews.Title: this was nice
Reviews.Author: Betty Aldridge-Brown "B J"
Reviews.Content: I gave my wife my 3rd generation and bought this one. this was a good buy. not to expensive and a very good device. I hope all of you out there can get a deal like I did. contact this company and just maybe. my thank to those that sold it to me

Reviews.Title: I love it
Reviews.Author: CHERI
Reviews.Content: It is fast and I have a lot of space. I have had previous models but lightening is the fastest yet.

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: Pen Name
Reviews.Content: Amazing product although I don't know if it is retina display. It works fantastic screen looks great. Pictures look great. I like the apps you can get for free.

Reviews.Title: Amazing!
Reviews.Author: Leah
Reviews.Content: I was somewhat skeptical of purchasing this online for my 9 year old son. However it arrived on time and we were all pleased and my son of course was extatic to say the least.I did purchase the square trade protection plan as well.

Reviews.Title: This thing is great...
Reviews.Author: Mark Meeks
Reviews.Content: I have an iPhone that I used to use to play games, but haven't used it for that since getting this.  Great product.

Reviews.Title: Fantastic Product, Fast Delivery as always with AMAZON
Reviews.Author: Paula delaPena
Reviews.Content: Very very happy with the product. The ipad4 is an awesome device. My son works for APPLE so it really helps with getting to know all of it's capabilities.

Reviews.Title: I love this product
Reviews.Author: mattelynn renee hardesty
Reviews.Content: Product was in great condition, I use it more than my cellphone and laptop. I Cant put it down <3

Reviews.Title: Ipad 4
Reviews.Author: johnj
Reviews.Content: Love this product. Will worth the investment! Think of the purchase in that sense. I'm extremely happy with the ipad retina, I plan to go back to school ( working on masters) so this will be the perfect tool for me.

Reviews.Title: Great ipad from a kind seller
Reviews.Author: jared jin
Reviews.Content: The product is as good as i expected.Thanks to the warmhearted seller.This ipad is almost like a new one with accessories running with it perfectly.I love it.It is a good deal for a used ipad .

Reviews.Title: Love at first sight
Reviews.Author: Jayne B.
Reviews.Content: I absolutely love my ipad.  I use it all day long.  I can't believe I waited so long to get one!!!

Reviews.Title: Can't put it down!
Reviews.Author: Jared Holt
Reviews.Content: Absolutely amazing! The Retina display is clear and crisp, the battery holds a charge for days even with prolonged use, and iOS is a solid operating system! I use mine for work and play and it has yet to let me down once. Very, very satisfied!

Reviews.Title: Should have done it a long time ago...
Reviews.Author: E. A. Pamer "Avid Reader"
Reviews.Content: The new iPad is awesome. It's easy to set up, download aps, sync with my Mac and iPhone, and fun to use. I'm still figuring out which aps I want but having fun doing it. The clarity of the new retina display is fantastic.

Reviews.Title: great machine
Reviews.Author: Heidi
Reviews.Content: everything about the ipad is wonderful.  it's fast, easy to use and an all around great piece of computing equipment.

Reviews.Title: Works Great
Reviews.Author: Nicholas A Riscinto
Reviews.Content: Bought it as a gift for my wife.  She loves it.  It replaces an I Pad we bought about 4 - 5 years ago.

Reviews.Title: Excellent
Reviews.Author: Kevin C. Holland
Reviews.Content: Awesome device.  Beats any Android tablet hands down.  A good price for an awesome case.  If you need phone protection and it be affordable, this is for you.

Reviews.Title: I love it!
Reviews.Author: Claudia Poleselo
Reviews.Content: The ipad arrived before the expected date. The conditions were great, the product was exactly what I was expecting and it really met all my needs. The only thing is that I wish the ipad 4 was not that heavy, but ok, I'm happy with it anyway.

Reviews.Title: Great Mother's Day Gift
Reviews.Author: Daniel A Brogan
Reviews.Content: Bought version 4 for wife so I could have more access to my version 2. She is loving it, and I am loving getting my iPad 2 back!

Reviews.Title: I am all day with it. And no need any more the note book.
Reviews.Author: Graciela Piñeyrúa
Reviews.Content: My son gift me a tablet one and I loved it and decide to buy a new like this. I always said everybody how happy I am to get it.

Reviews.Title: upgrading from iPad1, this is GREAT!
Reviews.Author: pol
Reviews.Content: love the speed, resolution, feeling when holding, the new connector.I was expecting the device to get uncomfortably hot (as read in some reviews) but it stays really cool with my current usage (browsing, email, youtube, reading).battery life is also exceptional.want the best tablet of the moment? this is it!

Reviews.Title: What is there left to say?
Reviews.Author: J. Hanks
Reviews.Content: This is an iPad.  It works wonderfully as such. It makes for a lousy Android tablet. It has good battery life, but is not a good replacement for batteries generally. The retina display is crisp, but compares unfavorably with a frosty autumn morning. It's too heavy too be a replacement for your kindle, but would be a wonderful alternative to avoid carrying around a complete encyclopedia. If you like Apple products you will love it. However, I do not recommend baking it into a pie.

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: Katherine E. Cavarretta "k t cav"
Reviews.Content: no issues whatsoever.  I love my iPad!! The seller followed up with me to  make sure I was satisfied with my purchase, and I am very satisfied.

Reviews.Title: MORE THAN SATISFIED
Reviews.Author: Bernard
Reviews.Content: After purchasing this unit. I fell in love with its performance. I ordered headphones, speakers a I TB hard drive storage device and other items.to enhance my experience. I like the mobility of not being confined to a desk. This unit is light nd easy to carry, even with its assessories.

Reviews.Title: I Pad 4 great tool for business AND entretaiment.
Reviews.Author: Juan Carlos Porcella "Juan Carlos Porcella"
Reviews.Content: Light weight, easy to use and many features for daily use. However, accesories are very expensive and hardware to find.

Reviews.Title: Ready to Travel
Reviews.Author: wlstott
Reviews.Content: Fast shipping, this was a great purchase for us - my wife loves it. We both are excited to travel on our boat using our ipad to navigate and stay in touch with family and friends!

Reviews.Title: Love it.
Reviews.Author: book lover
Reviews.Content: I is exactly what I wanted.  It works perfectly.  Very glad I purchased it.  I love to read and it makes a great reader and I use it a lot for emails and etc.  Handier  than my large computers.

Reviews.Title: Perfect
Reviews.Author: momof3
Reviews.Content: It's the perfect fit for my life.  Can do all my work on the go and at home! And so light weight!

Reviews.Title: iPad
Reviews.Author: Ale
Reviews.Content: Very good. Excellent Product. Would recommend it for everyone. It. Was way beyong my expectations and definetely surprised my kids. The entire family is enjoying it. Seller was also quick shipper

Reviews.Title: Great iPad at great price!
Reviews.Author: Lee A.
Reviews.Content: Love the product! this is my first Apple product even though I have worked on them over the years. Now is see where the love of these products comes from.I Got a great deal and it came before projected date of delivery. LOVE THAT.

Reviews.Title: I Love It
Reviews.Author: Ed Kramer
Reviews.Content: It wasn't the cheapest price around, but I used American Express points and $200 to purchase my iPad. Now... That's a great bargain. It's everything they said they said about it.  And... It arrived on time.

Reviews.Title: It's what it want
Reviews.Author: Mariana Muñoz Zerbino
Reviews.Content: I love it, it is wonderfull. I can work in my home or any where. It is perfect for mi.

Reviews.Title: Love it can't put it down
Reviews.Author: GOLDCYLON
Reviews.Content: It hard to complain about an IPAD. It's form and function are wonderful and the battery life is spectacular. Love it can't think of owning any other tablet

Reviews.Title: Excellent product! Very easy to use and a true joy not to carry a laptop arround.
Reviews.Author: Stephen P Carney
Reviews.Content: Easy to purchase easy to use. It is the bridge between the small screen of the iphone and the bulk of a laptop.We should have done it sooner!

Reviews.Title: Great Buy
Reviews.Author: RA
Reviews.Content: Great buy, product arrived as promised am very pleased and would buy again.Very good experience. This was a purchase for my wife's birthday and she is very happy..

Reviews.Title: Fantrastic iPad
Reviews.Author: Dee Dee
Reviews.Content: Fantrastic...fast shipping (within 4 days).  Other than the battery getting low very quickly (every couple of days), which really doesn't bother me.  I really do love it and highly recoommend it.

Reviews.Title: It is iPad, what else?
Reviews.Author: Lidia
Reviews.Content: How to rate an iPad? It has disadvantages, but ore advantages from my point of view. I tried another tablet before, which was broken 3 days after purchasing. Since then, I have it clear, there is no better tablet in the market right now, from the HW point of view. I missed the simplicity of using Android, above all everything related to files management (I do not like iTunes)

Reviews.Title: very happy
Reviews.Author: sandra
Reviews.Content: I love this I can do so much on it  , it is unbelievable ,  I even brought my daughter one  , so she would stop using mine

Reviews.Title: First Mac Purchasse
Reviews.Author: J. Ray "Searcher1"
Reviews.Content: My first Mac purchase was this IPad and so far it's been great. No problems with setup but am still learing all the ins and outs. Haven't explored all the possibilities of it yet but soon.

Reviews.Title: Why did I wait so long!
Reviews.Author: Janice L. Fratus
Reviews.Content: Basically, it was due to doing lots of research, which really paid off.So happy and love the ease of all of the features.

Reviews.Title: love it
Reviews.Author: Anne Q.
Reviews.Content: always happy with apple products...look forward to seeing what's next...keep up the good work! That's about all I have to say about that...

Reviews.Title: works great.
Reviews.Author: Abigail J McGee
Reviews.Content: I am very happy with my product.No dents or dings in casing. The screen is great an clean. All spotless. Came in original case. Works great and am very impressed with product.Thank you.

Reviews.Title: Today's Technology
Reviews.Author: Harley
Reviews.Content: I'm new to technology, but this old fogey is learning!  I will like it, however, and since I used my credit cards perks for it, so much the better!

Reviews.Title: iPad 4th Generation with Retina Display
Reviews.Author: Gary
Reviews.Content: I sold my Samsung Galaxy Tablet 7.0" and got the iPad 4th Generation with Retina Display. I love the iPad for the clearest resolution display and simple usage.Simplification of use is the best there is. There is no lag on the iOS6. The A6X chip is fast. The Wi-Fi connection is 10-times faster than other Android tablets out there. The Safari browser loads in seconds. The sound is also clearer and volume control is loud. The ease of navigation is simple.You cannot go wrong with the iPad with the Retina Display.

Reviews.Title: Good Experience purchasing $650 Ipad
Reviews.Author: Paul T.
Reviews.Content: The purchase went very smooth.  Ipad arrived as described, perfect condition.  The warranty was actually longer than advertised, which was nice.

Reviews.Title: Best iPad yet!!
Reviews.Author: Joshua R Barr
Reviews.Content: Received it in about 48 hours after ordering.  I has almost no scratches or blemishes on it, and the 1 scratch I did find on it is not even big enough to hardly notice unless you really look for it.

Reviews.Title: this was a gift for my wife for mothers day and she was estatic !
Reviews.Author: burnist hall
Reviews.Content: the most imortant things she mentioned  were the great photo features and expanding the display for easier vewing on small details..

Reviews.Title: The newest Apple iPad is the best!
Reviews.Author: Kellymc
Reviews.Content: This is my first tablet...I am very happy with the iPad! I did a lot of research and the iPad won all comparisons hands down. It's fast and I really don't miss carrying my laptop everywhere. The quality is amazing.

Reviews.Title: Lovely
Reviews.Author: avid reader
Reviews.Content: As with all Apple products, this is great.I loved from it from the time I saw it.  It is my constant companion and I will strongly recommend it to all who are looking for a tablet.

Reviews.Title: Exactly what I wanted
Reviews.Author: Laura M. Combs
Reviews.Content: The new Apple iPad 5 does exactly what I needed a tablet to do. Very fast, vivid colors, looks great. Very happy.

Reviews.Title: Incredible Device.
Reviews.Author: Ha b.
Reviews.Content: This product is incredible item, i love it. I do not know how it works in the future, but it works so well now. It connects to the web as quick as lightning.After using for few months, the iPad is still working well, but the home charger had the problem. After 30 or 45 minutes, the charger was very hot, I must unplug it and wait until it was cool down and plug in again. It took so long for fully charge on my iPad.

Reviews.Title: Very good, but still over-priced
Reviews.Author: Tybee Island
Reviews.Content: As well as they work, they continue to charge too much for the iPad and accompanying memoryHope they will change that.

Reviews.Title: Love my Retina Display Ipad!
Reviews.Author: Sheryl Steffens
Reviews.Content: This Ipad has amazing clarity..It goes really well with the Logitech hard slim keyboard case.  I also have applied the 2 Gorilla skins which protects both the ipad side and the keyboard side.

Reviews.Title: Apple I Pad with Retina Display
Reviews.Author: Sara Brandt
Reviews.Content: It isn't that we don't like our Apple I pad, but it does take some time to get use to it, after using a standard computer.  We found that i pad for  Dummies (seniors) was very helpful.  Over all we like our apple because it is easier to carry than our laptop.

Reviews.Title: Finally, Ready for Business. And families.
Reviews.Author: Tate Linden "Thingnamer"
Reviews.Content: I bought my first tablet computer about a decade ago and was severely disappointed with the functionality. Nothing was intuitive, everything required additional steps, nothing tied in with anything else. Today's generation of tablets has solved these issues and more. And they've done it in a way that is useful for home or business users considering tablet solutions.I now am able to run my organization's billing, reporting, presentations, and speeches from my handheld tablet. I can pair it with my iphone to control presentations remotely, or use it (in combination with special software and hardware add-ons) as a teleprompter. I haven't yet gotten to the point that I will travel without my laptop computer, but I'm getting close.On the flip side, when I get home the iPad serves as an entertainment hub for the family, controlling our entertainment center, providing affordable gaming for the kids (or me on occasion), and connecting me with my network of friends.The only downside is that this (in combination with the iPhone) makes it very difficult to unplug yourself and just experience life as it happens. I've walked into rooms when relatives are visiting and found every single person looking at their phones or iPads instead of chatting with each other. Of course, that may just be because we're all pretty boring.

Reviews.Title: IPad de Apple con Retina Display MD512LL / A 64GB, Wi-Fi, Negro
Reviews.Author: José Navas
Reviews.Content: Excellent team worth investing in something like this, I'm very happy with my purchase I recommend here in Venezuela I work very well.

Reviews.Title: Great stuff!
Reviews.Author: Blue
Reviews.Content: very good! the ipad came with the box and usb charger.perfect screen and I really like it.Very good stuff!Thanks!

Reviews.Title: Excellent service and quality. I am happy. Blue Glass Solutions is the best
Reviews.Author: Alba Rodriguez
Reviews.Content: I am happy with Blue Glass Solutions. They gave me the best service, price and quality. I recommend them highly.

Reviews.Title: Fast
Reviews.Author: CheliMex
Reviews.Content: My new IPad came really fast and I love  it, it is really fast when surfing the web. I really enjoyed it.....thanks

Reviews.Title: Love It
Reviews.Author: Dianne Ford
Reviews.Content: Still experimenting with all the features, but so far I love it!  I really got this for my husband, but he lets me use it too!

Reviews.Title: Apple iPad 4 w/ retina display
Reviews.Author: LJP
Reviews.Content: This is my first iPad. I use an android smartphone, so you can say Apple products are new and "fresh" to me ! I learned quite a lot on how to use my iPad, my  17 year old daughter helped me too. I absolutely love my iPad and am amazed by how much I can do with it.  I will never be without one from here on. Great product.  The Apple company is fantastic, great apps too !

Reviews.Title: Fabulous
Reviews.Author: Dorothy M. Larimore "dynamite duck"
Reviews.Content: After careful deliberation and investigation we felt that the Apple iPad with Retina Display 64 GB would meet all of our needs.  We will link it to an aviation program as is done in cockpits of airliners.  Couldn't be happier with it.

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: Kevin
Reviews.Content: I was a little hesitant, not sure if i really NEEDED it, but i love it.  Turns out i didn't really NEED it after buying a laptop, but i wouldnt give it up.  Its so much nicer to goof around on than my phone.  I rarely use my phone to browse on now unless i am away from home.  It seems so small and cumbersome now that i have the iPad.

Reviews.Title: Easy to use with wonderful the best of all the tablets
Reviews.Author: Craig Getzlaff
Reviews.Content: The Apple iPad is very easy to use and carry around with you. It has a wonderful display / touch screen. You can also access a ton of Music and Apps. Many of these Apps are wonderful and free, or wonderful and inexpensive. Even if you have only used PCs all your life, like myself, you will still find the iPad to be the best of all the tablets.

Reviews.Title: nice
Reviews.Author: James F Ryan
Reviews.Content: order was filled in timely manner and my questions answered prompty. new tech was what i wanted and thats what i got.still learning new operating system but happy to avoid latest windows system.

Reviews.Title: Like it
Reviews.Author: Brian McNeill
Reviews.Content: I use this for flying for charts in flight weather, moving map and every thing a pilot would need.The screen handles the sun very well and I have never not been able to see it.

Reviews.Title: My first tablet ever
Reviews.Author: Richard Le
Reviews.Content: I finally own a tablet and I absolutely love it. The design and quality shows why apple is on top of the tablet game.

Reviews.Title: As good as they describe!
Reviews.Author: Richard M. Miller
Reviews.Content: Perfect tablet. Yes it is pricey but the retina display is fantastic.Useful for a bunch of things...no need to bring a laptop anymore. I highly recommend the most memory you can afford though - especially if you use it for photography business.

Reviews.Title: Good Product
Reviews.Author: Uscdld
Reviews.Content: This product was everything we'd though it would be and more. I'm not a huge Apple geek like some so I couldn't really tell you the difference between this version of iPad and the prior versions, but the screen is clear and it processes quickly. It was a good purchase.

Reviews.Title: Perfect condition
Reviews.Author: Jimmmy
Reviews.Content: The iPad 4 with retina display is stunning to watch, the picture quality is better than expected. The seller sold it as in brand new condition and I couldn't tell that it was ever opened. The packaging and shipping were great and very quick.

Reviews.Title: My new iPad
Reviews.Author: Van
Reviews.Content: It's everything I expected and then some. I recommend it highly. I hardly ever use my laptop anymore since it's so portable I always carry it with me.

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: Lenore Prelutsky
Reviews.Content: I am really enjoying my iPad  there is a lot i need to learn  It is great and I am looking forward to learn a lot

Reviews.Title: Still the best tablet
Reviews.Author: ASL
Reviews.Content: I was looking for a replacement for the 2 year old original iPad and looked at a number of Android tablets as well as Windows 8 tablets. In the end decided to go with iPad 4 and feel it was a good decision. The screen is amazing, the overall experience with the device is much improved compared to the original iPad. Transferring content and apps from the old device to the new one was painless, everything transferred perfectly except for one odd weather app which had to be reinstalled.

Reviews.Title: great product
Reviews.Author: Orlando Gibson
Reviews.Content: Works good like expected and at a very good price. bought it as a graduation price and scored a hit

Reviews.Title: Love
Reviews.Author: Ashley A Rothermel
Reviews.Content: I am so happy with my iPad! I love everything about it!  It came sooner then I thought it would and was very happy with the sender! Thanks again!

Reviews.Title: Good product but no WOW affect
Reviews.Author: color me satisfied
Reviews.Content: Surprised at my expected response from this product.  Sometimes when I swipe on the lower part of the screen the pages do not advance, I have to move slightly higher to get the pages to turn.  I expected more i guess.

Reviews.Title: Yes Love is the word :)
Reviews.Author: waldo
Reviews.Content: This 128GB iPad has been totally enjoyed by my son, I gave it to him because he would use my corporate iPad endlessly and you know  I needed it too.My son is autistic and this device keeps him focused and gaming for now.There are apps for speech games that I will load for him as we go forward.I would recommend this iPad to all people of earth.Thank You

Reviews.Title: Apple iPad with Retina Display
Reviews.Author: Peter Trevor Lamontagne
Reviews.Content: I did not have tothink too much about this.  I got an iPad six months ago and my wife wanted a similar one.  Wish I couldhave kept this newer version.

Reviews.Title: Wonderful
Reviews.Author: Justin
Reviews.Content: Fast, simple and efficient. This is the perfect gadget, the retina display is amazing and the battery is the best.

Reviews.Title: High Quality IPad
Reviews.Author: Kcsrider "Kcsrider"
Reviews.Content: I purchased this IPad to give to my wife as a gift a year ago.  She uses it endlessly for anything and everything.  Her laptop gets very little use anymore.  The screen is a bit fragile, and Apple wants an arm and a leg to replace the glass if it breaks.  A high quality case is a wise investment, not only for ease of use, but for protection from breakage.  These things are expensive, but well worth the money if you use a computer much or require portability.  No more laptops on vacation!

Reviews.Title: Best yet!
Reviews.Author: Susie "Proof Reader Wannabe"
Reviews.Content: I had the iPad 2 and loved it but I quickly ran out of room with only 64GB between my music, movies and books after 2 years. But I did not want a smaller screen. So, the iPad 4 meets my needs perfectly. I am not a gamer, so not having Flash really is no big deal. Love that Siri is included with this version. No more typing emails! With the addition of Apple TV I can watch movies on the iPad or TV. Just wish Apple and Amazon would share their respective Gateways on both Apple TV and Roku. I could not afford both and would love to be able to use Amazon Video player on my TV without the need for extra accessories.

Reviews.Title: Excellent product
Reviews.Author: mercyme
Reviews.Content: The Apple IPad with Retina Display is a joy to use...it has made me more productive and it has made my worklife more organized....the carmera is a plus--great photos! I recommend downloading the user's guide to get the most out of the product as quickly as possible.

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: Scott Machen
Reviews.Content: Fast ship could have used more packing material but but both were in great shape use them all the time. 10 hour battery life is false but that's not the fault of this company it's all on apple

Reviews.Title: Great Product
Reviews.Author: Avid DVD watcher ""Lady D""
Reviews.Content: This is my first iPad and I love.  My partner has the iPad 2 and I can really tell the difference between the two.  The 4 is much faster than the 2 and has better resolution.  There are a number of other items that make it much better than the 2.  I am not sure about the difference between the 3 and 4 but as I said there is a marked difference between the 2 and 4.

Reviews.Title: Speechless ....
Reviews.Author: utkarsh shah
Reviews.Content: What can you say about the apple retina display,,??awesomesttt...thats it..Its a product that you have desired in a tablet..I guess it is more than that...thank you jobs....

Reviews.Title: excellent
Reviews.Author: Fernando
Reviews.Content: Excellet purchase, I received it in the correct time without problems and works perfectly. Apple always in the first places

Reviews.Title: I do not know why I waited so long
Reviews.Author: AWE
Reviews.Content: I should have bought a pad along time ago. I have no regrets whatever.  The only problem is it might make me lazy. Instead of going to the computer desk, I now read my daily newspapers in bed, with larger fonts. Excellent purchase. I loved the 4pics1word game. I did all. I can go on and on with praises. Thank you Apple.

Reviews.Title: IPAD 32 GB
Reviews.Author: guadalupe hernandez
Reviews.Content: Awesome purchase!  Just what we were seeking in an IPAD at a very good price. Was easy and a pleasure doing business with this seller. We are thoroughly enjoying our new IPAD and intend to purchase another.  32GB is perfect for our intended use.

Reviews.Title: Apple Ipad
Reviews.Author: Dana G. Boyd
Reviews.Content: My Grandaughter was very pleased with it.  She said I had made her day.  Thank You, Dana Boyd.  I will be needing another in about a year for my grandson.

Reviews.Title: As expected
Reviews.Author: Gary Spiker
Reviews.Content: Completely recommended.  The quality of the retina display is second to none.  Battery life lasts all day.  So many apps to keep me busy.

Reviews.Title: Happy, Happy Happy it looks great
Reviews.Author: Larry K DeBlieux
Reviews.Content: Had a iPad first generation and there is no comparison to this one.  Great product from Apple and would recommend to others.

Reviews.Title: one of the best purchases ive made
Reviews.Author: Vironka Davis
Reviews.Content: i'm a post graduate student and bought this ipad for school. it is a great educational tool and is worth every penny. i havent had any problems at all with my ipad from this seller. im not an apple geek and this is my only apple product, but i couldn't be happier with it. its great to be able to take notes and highlight on my textbook and class notes right on the ipad and have less to carry around.

Reviews.Title: I had no Internet connection problems at all
Reviews.Author: sumrsolo
Reviews.Content: The seller was great and this arrived 3 days earlier than what was expected! I love it and it came in excellent condition. I don't know what a lot of people are talking about this iPad 4 having problems connecting to their wireless Internet and crashing a lot. This hasn't happened to me once yet and I'm not saying it hasn't happened to them but it is probably their internet's fault and not the device's fault because I have like the cheapest Internet and the cheapest Internet router but mine connects fine and hasn't crashed once. So that should tell you something. This is my first iPad and the only thing I will complain about is the battery life. It is terrible but then again I'm on mine a lot since I need it so much with making YouTube videos and doing my other work on it like my poetry. This is my only computer so I rely on it a ton. It is reliable in everything else though so I just suggest that you keep a wall adapter and charger handy wherever you are.

Reviews.Title: iPad 3
Reviews.Author: Johan Marquez
Reviews.Content: iPad 3Cumplió con lo indicado en lo oferta.Excelente producto lo recomiendo, vendedor serió. Me gusto la rapidez.Saludos.

Reviews.Title: Perfect and nice
Reviews.Author: Cláudia Carvalho
Reviews.Content: Easy to handle. Good price. Fast. I cannot compare with the others models because this is my first but de screen definition is good.

Reviews.Title: loving my new ipad 4th gen 64GB White:)
Reviews.Author: NF
Reviews.Content: For those that don't know: microsoft Word, Excel, Powerpoint, etc. are all avaiable for FREE at the apple App Store. The name of the program is OnLive Desktop. I can now leave my netbook at home and bring my ipad to my university to take notes!This iPad 4th gen 64GB White is beautiful. Came with iOS 6.0 and I jailbroke it within minutes with evasi0n!I just ordered the best cover ever: Snugg iPad 4 & iPad 3 Case - Leather Case Cover and Flip Stand with Elastic Hand Strap and Premium Nubuck Fibre Interior (White) - Automatically Wakes and Puts the iPad 4 & 3 to Sleep. Superior Quality Design as Featured in GQ Magazine in White and a great bluetooth keyboard: Anker® Ultra Slim Mini Bluetooth 3.0 Wireless Keyboard for iPad Mini / iPad / Nexus 7 / Galaxy Tab and other Tablets - White.Very happy purhases :).

Reviews.Title: Finally Gave In and Bought an iPad!
Reviews.Author: Finland421
Reviews.Content: I am so glad I finally gave into the urge to buy an iPad.  I love the display quality, camera, sound and iCloud functions that sync to my iPhone and Mac.  I still have a lot to learn, but really like it so far.  I bought the Logitech Ultrathin Keyboard cover and love it also.  I'm a keyboard fan and don't mind a compact feel.  I carry them nicely in a Vera Bradley tablet sleeve.  Excellent purchase!

Reviews.Title: Great product.  Apple did it again.
Reviews.Author: Renae Dunbar
Reviews.Content: love, love, love it.  Am purchasing another for my other daughter and probably one for me in the near future.

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: armchaircowgirl
Reviews.Content: What's not to like about an iPad? So much more convenient than booting up my laptop to check email, and lots of games and other apps. Loving it!

Reviews.Title: Absolutely love it!! My new toy.
Reviews.Author: Nilda Vergara
Reviews.Content: I would recommend this product.  Received as a Christmas gift from my boss, love her.  Use it everyday for surfing the web ~ shopping;  email and facebook.....just absolutely love it!!!!

Reviews.Title: iPad Review
Reviews.Author: Janie Forsythe
Reviews.Content: I love it!! Retina Display makes everything so crystal clear and sharp.  Have truly enjoyed the user friendliness of getting around in the iPad and exploring its options.

Reviews.Title: Greatest ever!
Reviews.Author: chris wood
Reviews.Content: I am not an avid owner of Apple products. In fact this is my first one. I bought it for my fiance' and she cannot put it down. I didn't have the Gen 3 to compare the screen resolution to but either way you can't shake a stick at how awesome it is. She cannot put it down.

Reviews.Title: Wow!
Reviews.Author: PJ "ggirl12"
Reviews.Content: I have had every iPad and I must say this is by far the most supreme IPad..fast, quick and gorgeous retina display..I love this IPad more than the IPad 3!!!

Reviews.Title: love my I Pad
Reviews.Author: Judith Matthews
Reviews.Content: I need the lightning to USB cable replaced (wire only) since the one delivered with my I Pad was damaged. my emails were unanswered, so I replaced the wire myself in order to use my pad.

Reviews.Title: Apple iPad with Retina Display
Reviews.Author: Martin W. Stroupe
Reviews.Content: This is my first Apple product, and first tablet. It works extremely well replacing a laptop computer, when used for; Facebook, videos, Oovoo, lite web surfacing, and games. And is extremely portable.

Reviews.Title: Just as advertived
Reviews.Author: Jeff Thill
Reviews.Content: I purchased this for my son's graduation and he is very excited. We compared the other note pads and he decided this is what he wanted to take to college with him.

Reviews.Title: Does all I need it to
Reviews.Author: Sage Wysocki
Reviews.Content: I can surf the web, take awesome pictures, all on an amazing screen.  This thing can do so much, I can't put it all into one review.  I can say that it's the perfect product for anyone.  I loved my last generation (3rd) so much that I upgraded to this.  The better front facing camera is a welcome addition, and I don't mind a faster processor either.  The lightning port doesn't bother me.

Reviews.Title: Great Product
Reviews.Author: Smithy
Reviews.Content: I am enjoying my iPad.  Still learning how to utilize it to the maximum and how to install apps.  Working at utilizing it in education.

Reviews.Title: Great Product!
Reviews.Author: Jane Marie Watson
Reviews.Content: I had bought this as a gift for my sister.  She absolutely loves it. Once she was able to connect to a network, she went exploring.

Reviews.Title: Love the Ipad
Reviews.Author: Kelly
Reviews.Content: I purchased the new Ipad with Retina soley for Golf Instruction purposes, and it has been wonderful. I would recommend this product to anyone.

Reviews.Title: Love!
Reviews.Author: Merry One
Reviews.Content: I love the ipad. Easy to use, beautiful display, all my apps in one place! This is a great product!

Reviews.Title: Totally Awesome
Reviews.Author: Dee
Reviews.Content: I just love my Ipad 4 64 GB I am so addicted to it, I use it all the time I recently returned it for the wifi with AT&T; so I can have internet access 24/7 no matter where I am whether it's in the car at the park or in a location that is not wifi ready. I love the games I love looking up different things on the internet.  I went two whole weeks without watching tv because the tablet itself is soo entertaining.  I bought books to read on it movies and the clarity of the pictures are awesome I took pictures at my brothers wedding and it came out gorgeous people were saying instead of hiring a photographer they could have hired me. I downloaded some app that frame the pictures and decorated it very nicely.  I just love it. This is my very first tablet and I love it, this is a must have.  I also bought the office word app so I can type, I just have to get my air printer and Im all set don't even use my laptop anymore.

Reviews.Title: This iPad is everything I wanted in a tablet - I hardly use my laptop now!
Reviews.Author: juanita beatty
Reviews.Content: I would recommend this iPad to everyone - you won't regret purchasing the best tablet on the market at all!

Reviews.Title: I just love my Ipad
Reviews.Author: Jean Francois Regnard
Reviews.Content: So easy to use. So easy to start using. So fast. So powerful. Such a beautiful object. I hesitated between the Ipad and the Surface (which is probably very good). Yet, I have no intention to have any regret....

Reviews.Title: Apple iPad w/Retina Display
Reviews.Author: Yooper Red Hatter
Reviews.Content: When I ordered it at midnight Sunday night, I had doubts it would arrive today, March 13, well it did! I have an iPhone so I'm finding it very user friendly! So far: AWESOME!  (I'm still learning & trying different app's!) Thanks Amazon, you still amaze me!

Reviews.Title: I love it
Reviews.Author: Zoe Covenant Stores
Reviews.Content: The retina display is an added plus. It just makes all your viewing enjoyable.For the video recording, appears to me the resolution below what I expected,or am I missing something?Do I have to change some settings? Overall great product!

Reviews.Title: its great!
Reviews.Author: PB
Reviews.Content: This model shows more capability than the last version which i also have.  love the color...speed and camera.  may get another one later this year.

Reviews.Title: Perfect
Reviews.Author: C. Misra
Reviews.Content: Superb in every respect.  Best thing I ever brought.  Sold my iPod touch 5g and Sony 42 inch led tv to justify cost and feel I came out ahead.  I like this thing a lot.  Had it a month now.  Likin it more than ever.  Once you go Retina, you can Never go back.  Far as I am concerned, my laptop can sit in that pawnshop til it rots away to nothing.  I'm not sure i can or will eer back to that hunk of garbage.  A 350 dollar hp I bought brand new in auGust 2011, and eighteen months later, one hour of use and it gets hot enough to fry bacon on.  Piece of junk.  Ad I believe it's truly the only time in life I had a problem with electronic item.  Cuz I don't use them too much.  Te ipad has been awesome.

Reviews.Title: Best Tablet
Reviews.Author: dlb "blue"
Reviews.Content: We have a fleet of devices, tablets included. The kids need the iPad for school. My husband bought me the new iPad 4, 4th generation with the fastest chip. We have the other brands of tablets in our home too for all of the kids as well as for the 3 of us, my elderly aunt included, so you can choose almost any brand of tablet or device to use. The iPad 4, the only one that is the 4th generation is in constant demand over all of the others, iPads except for the iPad mini, the others,  Samsung is the least popular, the Nexus they will use  and there is another brand I won't name. LOLThe iPad 4 is so fast, remarkably so, the Retina Display is simply picture perfect, the colors do not overwhelm like other brands to with their overly saturated colors. The wifi has the best connection I've had on a mobile device. The App Store makes it even nicer with the wealth of full sized tablet Apps, not stretched out phone apps, along with the ability to watch your movies, listen to your music and use 3rd party apps to access all of your Amazon content. It has Netflix, the Kindle App, Video App from Amazon, so much. I can't find anything to complain about and I don't have anything that I can't find on here to use for fun or for work.It's an A++++++choice for us and the best out there at this time I feelOh Itunes U is a phenomenal addition to any iPad

Reviews.Title: She loves it!!
Reviews.Author: Den NJ
Reviews.Content: My wife loves it. She says it needs little charging that the battery has a long charge life.She would recommend this item very much.If you thought about buying one..STOP THINKING! JUST DO IT! GET ONE!!

Reviews.Title: I simply love it
Reviews.Author: Ana Sanchez
Reviews.Content: I am not a person without my IPad any longer . It makes my busy life easiest and Siri is my best friend.

Reviews.Title: IPAD
Reviews.Author: Texlex57
Reviews.Content: Saved some dollars on this purchase and the IPAD is working great. Wonderful job of supply and demand. Works like a charm.

Reviews.Title: great device
Reviews.Author: New SolidWorks Instructor
Reviews.Content: Great device. This is my first tablet. I love it. So far, I am very impressed with all the available applications: business, education, sport, entertainment, etc. The 9.7 retina display provides a super clear view that is better than anything on a PC windows laptop.

Reviews.Title: Best Yet
Reviews.Author: vetpathguy
Reviews.Content: So happy with the new iPad. Camera is great (i upgraded from iPAd 1st gen), so much faster, facetime, skype, Viber work great. Email is great.  Only a few glitches with notification sounds when smart cover is on. Took a while for sounds to alert when cover was on, but now works great. Not sure why this happens, but IVe seen several similar issues, and appears to be a random thing.

Reviews.Title: Just Awesome!
Reviews.Author: JOHN
Reviews.Content: My first Apple product. Does everything you want it to. Runs fast and easy to operate. I have had it for a month. Plays movies perfect. Resolution is awesome. Would highly recommend.

Reviews.Title: Best tablet ever
Reviews.Author: fernando Fuenmayor "nando"
Reviews.Content: Don't buy anything else, a bunch of apps and good games and free most of then, buy it over 32gb

Reviews.Title: Very Useful
Reviews.Author: Rick Fryan
Reviews.Content: This is a great Tool for me and my Business.  I like it for reading Books as well - The Battery Life is AWESOME!!!

Reviews.Title: Love this IPAD
Reviews.Author: Joanne
Reviews.Content: I had an Android tablet which worked well for me but the battery died after just 16 months.  Figured I would pay the price and try the IPAD.  The display is sharper.  Love the extra features.  I didn't expect to see such a difference.  If the battery holds up, (I have only used this for a couple nows) I expect that I will not go back to the Android tablet.

Reviews.Title: Apple iPad with Retina Display
Reviews.Author: Cathy J. Hauptly "Cathy"
Reviews.Content: I am extremely happy with the product and the service.  It is exactly as described and I was very impressed with the service as well.  Would definitely do business with them again.

Reviews.Title: Latest Apple tablet--enough said.
Reviews.Author: Roy, Sr.
Reviews.Content: I really like this tablet and am very glad I waited to by it until several generations were available to learn from.  32 GB is VERY sufficent for me for both personal and business uses.

Reviews.Title: perfect
Reviews.Author: GUANGBO XIE
Reviews.Content: I have received my new apple ipad with retina display (16G) this morning. sealed very well, it's a new one. I have played with it for about one hour, very good.

Reviews.Title: Excelente herramienta
Reviews.Author: Daniel Camacho
Reviews.Content: El producto es una excelente herramienta diseñada para facilitarle la vida al consumidor, logrando converger hobbies, aministración de correos y redes sociales, todo en uno.

Reviews.Title: excelente producto
Reviews.Author: albert colina
Reviews.Content: 100% recomendado excelente producto, no tengo queja alguna en lo absoluto, muchas gracias por todo, estar pendiente para ofertar proximos productos de ustedes saludos

Reviews.Title: Apple I-Pad with Retina Display 32 GB
Reviews.Author: goltac
Reviews.Content: I love the sharpness of the I-Pad but have yet to find what it can do.  I'm having fun playing with it but need to learn much more.

Reviews.Title: Love the new iPad 4!
Reviews.Author: Rachel
Reviews.Content: Bought one for myself and one for my husband, got them yesterday and setup was super easy.We're both first time tablet and apple users, so still getting used to not being on a laptop for everything.No complaints from us and we anticipate it's going to be awesome as everyone says.Will update later on

Reviews.Title: so glad i waited till now... this device is flawless
Reviews.Author: Sean Maytum "Think different use a Hackintosh"
Reviews.Content: I didn't really want to fall into the apple hype and get the latest, greatest device. but i had seen some amazing demonstrations of what this device can do for both controlling music daws(digital audio workstations) and draw/painting aps with a proper stylus. So i took the plunge. I was not disappointed, but what really amazed me was amazing the web(facebook, internet reading etc...) look on this device. it is crystal clear and so much easier on the eye than my laptop or iphone. it's literally the perfect size. photos look exactly like what they are supposed to look like. I also love this model as it's the "budget" model with the smallest hard drive and no phone service. i just hook it up to wifi and i'm set. Also i don't need a lot hard drive space as i'm not really storing anything on it, just accessing the web.

Reviews.Title: Ipad With Retina Display
Reviews.Author: Jose Alejandro Salazar Salazar
Reviews.Content: Excelente.. Muy buena el Ipad.. Mejor nitidez, mas rapida, muchas mejoras en el iOS 6.. Lo unico es que se calienta un poco mas que el Ipad 2.

Reviews.Title: Quality Tablet
Reviews.Author: Frank C.
Reviews.Content: I love the Android environment but the ipad is still the best tablet you can buy.  ios feels a bit boring and outdated but everything runs so smoothly. Retina display is gorgeous and online browsing with Safari is just the best. And of course the thousands of apps available are a pleasure to use on this tablet.  The build quality of the hardware is unmatched.  There's nothing plasticky about this tablet.  It's just plain solid.  Well worth the $499 I spent on the 16 gb version.

Reviews.Title: IPad Retina Display
Reviews.Author: D. HOFER "Barb"
Reviews.Content: This is my first iPad but not my first electronic device. I am enjoying it immensely! It is a little bit of a leaning curve, as I am a long time MS user. But it's coming along and I am enjoying my "new toy".

Reviews.Title: the best product
Reviews.Author: Mindy
Reviews.Content: Brand new sealed in box. i cant put it down.  Fast delivery, cant go wrong in puchasing an ipad its worth the money.

Reviews.Title: A gift for my sister!
Reviews.Author: Warlito
Reviews.Content: I usually go online for shopping and i ran into this beautiful Newest IPAD which is cheap and made my sister happy. All in all I like the product and I will sure shop on this seller again. Very Accurate description.

Reviews.Title: This product is everything that apple says it is
Reviews.Author: Sam
Reviews.Content: The speed is amazing. I have an iPad2. Under the hood, the iPad4 is just amazing at the speed with which it processes everything. If there was a 6 star, it would have earned it.

Reviews.Title: Excellent product I love my iPad
Reviews.Author: Cecilia Rosas
Reviews.Content: I recommend this iPad to anyone who's interested in a tablet. Is amazing all the stuff you can do with it!

Reviews.Title: Perfect for multiple uses
Reviews.Author: J. L. Brundage
Reviews.Content: We are very happy with our new iPad.  We are able to download numerous applications that are helpful at home and away.  I love the cooking app's that are available as we do a lot of our own cooking when traveling and having recipes available makes it so easy.  It is also very convenient because it's size makes it easy to use around the house, outside when we are enjoying the weather, or if we are traveling.  It is all we hoped for.

Reviews.Title: Best Purchase Ever
Reviews.Author: Coleen A. Edwards
Reviews.Content: This tablet is truly the top of the line. Apple's customer service is awesome. This tablet is pricy but worth every penny.

Reviews.Title: Wife loves it!
Reviews.Author: Paul "El Lobo"
Reviews.Content: She uses it for multiple purposes including internet, games and more. It was a Christmas present and well worth it.

Reviews.Title: Love it.
Reviews.Author: Joseph Raschi
Reviews.Content: Great product and love it so far.  Quick shipment and price was right - although I wish I bought the 3G version just to have the option in the future.

Reviews.Title: Good but not great
Reviews.Author: Manuel Vargas
Reviews.Content: I bought this iPad to replace my son's iPod thinking that I will upgrade his fun and entertainment, but the change only represents a bigger screen, the games I used to use for the iPod, many of them are useless for the iPad, so think twice if you want to chance you device thinking that you will upgrade your stuffs to a bigger screen, because it won't be like this...

Reviews.Title: awesome
Reviews.Author: scarymarysanta
Reviews.Content: I love it, and of course its an apple! the sellers are efficient and fast, and it came like the wind

Reviews.Title: GREAT PRICE THAT CAN'T BE BEAT!!
Reviews.Author: Sheree "Sheree"
Reviews.Content: My Hubby bought me this IPad 4 for Christmas 2012 and I love it! It's my first IPad ...to be frank we could never afford one before Amazon came out with this GREAT deal.It's so fast! We have a HP laptop that can do somethings that the IPad cannot like our IPhone5 and 4Gs but I rarley even turn my laptop on now...My Hubby also bought me the keyboard with WiFi (bluetooth) and that is just iceing on top ! You can't bet the price and the lighting fast IPad 4.

Reviews.Title: Great love it!
Reviews.Author: Jedi master "j"
Reviews.Content: Great deal on this one of a kind technological marvel, how things change so quick. I and my family hardly use the computer anymore after getting this. Great is all I can say!

Reviews.Title: I love my iPad
Reviews.Author: Nelxon "artist, animator, programmer, game de...
Reviews.Content: No point in me writing a long review, I love my iPad: I'm writing this review with it right now...

Reviews.Title: Why we like the iPad
Reviews.Author: Dr. Arthur A. Thompson, Jr.
Reviews.Content: It was a gift for my grandson and he is thrilled with it. It is "replacing" his old laptop computer.

Reviews.Title: great for everyone
Reviews.Author: Ralph B. Richey
Reviews.Content: Got it for my wife and she can't put it down. Guess I need to get one for myself. LOL

Reviews.Title: I love this product
Reviews.Author: Eddy Chance
Reviews.Content: It had a great display. It was very easy to setup and I started using it immediately. It was easy to transfer applications from my iPhone 4s to the new iPad.

Reviews.Title: Apple iPad with Retina Display MD510LL/A (16GB, Wi-Fi, Black) NEWEST...
Reviews.Author: Moe Skeeto
Reviews.Content: The best way to describe this iPad is "WOW."  It has everything you need to "conduct business" when you're away, or to simply pass the time with the many included apps and games.  Works great with a nearby Wi-Fi, but also with my iPhone which has a built in "Hotspot."  Apple is the best!

Reviews.Title: love it
Reviews.Author: Dwight Lilly
Reviews.Content: I am extremely happy with the quality of the display.  The ipad is exactly what I was looking for in a tablet.  We are planning a trip to Germany and expect to use it for referencing and to take pictures and movies.

Reviews.Title: Loves
Reviews.Author: The Black Rapper
Reviews.Content: My wife loves it. The new Apple iPad with Retina display 32gb white 4th generation is so smooth and user friendly. Done.

Reviews.Title: Best tablet ever
Reviews.Author: G
Reviews.Content: Hands down, the retina dipslay is the most amazing dipslay ever. This is the best tab,et so far. Heavily recommended
