Reviews.Title: Resisted iPad for years-outstanding product
Reviews.Author: ESPRESSO MAVEN
Reviews.Content: Product is awesome-quality and display nothing short of incredible. Anxious to transfer my windows experience to apple format with xls, word and other type documents.

Reviews.Title: Apple IPad
Reviews.Author: Ethel Ann McCoy
Reviews.Content: Better than I thought it would be. Easy and fun to use and want to use it all the time

Reviews.Title: I'm loving it
Reviews.Author: Daddy D
Reviews.Content: I picked this iPad up as a Christmas gift to myself. I have been looking to upgrade from a toshiba thrive. After looking at several tablets I decided to go with the iPad. Let me say there are several nice options from Samsung and google as well as other tablets that may do a few things better. Overall the iPad is the best tablet on the market as of right now. I use it everyday from listening to music and podcast to watching movies and reading various news articles. The screen resolution is amazing the sound is nice and strong. I would recommend it and if possible get at least 32g

Reviews.Title: iPad
Reviews.Author: Ginny Calderon
Reviews.Content: This iPad is everything I thought it would be and then more! All Apple products that I have tried are easy to navigate and understand. I am enjoying my iPad.

Reviews.Title: I love this IPad.
Reviews.Author: Dominick Castrogiovanni
Reviews.Content: I love this thing I use it everyday to read & watch movies on it. I even take it everywhere with me instead of my lap-top. I don't any complaints on it at all.

Reviews.Title: Sorry, I will gave amazon 5 stars.
Reviews.Author: Jan. w "Jan. W."
Reviews.Content: I ordered an ipad 4 16gb wifi, but I got one that was an ipad 3 16 gb.Yes, I bought from amazon warehouse deal, nearly $400, but Ipad 4 is an ipad4 , you can not ship another one to replace it?I did not know about the different between 3 and 4, but my daughter knows them very well, she showed me the youtube,the physicaldifference about ipad 3 and 4 is the connection cable, that is why I post my review here, just be careful !!!when you receive any ipad from amazon, make sure, you got what you paid for.

Reviews.Title: Defective
Reviews.Author: A.S.
Reviews.Content: At this point I have to rate this product a 1 because after TEN HOURS of charging it wont work.  Not with the "on/home" button trick, nada.  All I ever got on the screen was the low battery symbol when I first plugged it in and now nada.  Very disappointed and now have to go through the ordeal of returning it when I really do not have the time as this was purchased using a grant and I have less than a month to show success with students using it or it comes out of my pocket.  Joy.

Reviews.Title: Reasons I don't like iPad
Reviews.Author: M&M; "MyTrueComment"
Reviews.Content: Tablets are now better and better.  When iPad 2 came out, it was good.  iPad 4 spec was appealing.  However, I found there are some issues on iPad 4.1.  Heavy.  It is as heavy as 7 inch blackberry playbook.2.  It has been like that on setup.  You need iTune or wifi.  I don't have a Windows PC or Mac, and I need mac address to connect to my router.  How can I do it?  Apple did not think about this problem.3.  No setup guide, not a sheet of instruction.4.  Not to mention the price cost more than others.I have not connect the tablet yet.  Probably let me kid connect to his iTune and get the Mac address.  More to come.I have the ASUS tf700, and I like it a lot.  My opinion, it is better than iPad.

Reviews.Title: I am not sure whether I should rate it as 1 star, but
Reviews.Author: Xuebo
Reviews.Content: The fact is that I bought this on amazon as a gift to my wife as a bday gift. I ordered it on Monday night, it arrived on Thurs afternoon. Slightly slower than what I expected (I am amazon prime, so I have 2 day delivery free). But that is ok.The product was delivered in sealed condition with "original" package ---- at least I could not find any sign of previous usage or anything. Everything so far is so good.Then we started to initialize this Ipad. It gave me black screen for a short time, which I thought it was just normal --- probably it was loading something. And after that, it seemed to be normal all the way to the end of the setup phase. The next thing we do is to download google Chrome on it. It briefly showed a "shaky" "blurred" screen for a second or so. And then back to normal.Then we started to explore its functionality like taking pictures etc. The frequency of "shaky" screen by now increases. Then we tried to download some free games. After we downloaded the first free game (I do not remember which, our purpose was just testing) app, it went black. This time for 15 minutes or so. This time, I do not think it is normal any more.But after that, we were able to restart it. Just to find that it is now a norm of showing shaky screens all the time. And then we were browsing to find apple support using it. It is then the whole thing died. It won't come back any more. So we had to send it back.I do not know who I should blame the problem to, or just unlucky to hit this one.

Reviews.Title: UPDATED 09-24-2013 came with a screeen scratch and problem with with iIOS 7
Reviews.Author: Carlos Garcia CCS-400097
Reviews.Content: I would have given it 5 stars. But even though the Amazon Market Place's packaging for shipment was as good as required for shipping and delivering this type of merchandise, and that the Apple iPad factory box was undamaged, both wrappings intact and unopened, the iPad screen came with a noticeable two centimeter hairline scratch on top center, right below the camera lens. The scratch was visible through the factory envelope-like cellophane wrapping around the iPad itself. That type of scratch, could not had happened at the seller's warehouses, nor during transportation/delivery because it requires direct contact with the screen to produce it and as I explained the delivery package and product box where undamaged and unopened, so responsibility lies with manufacturing facility during or before final boxing of the iPad, which says a little of quality assurance and control in this case. That is, I do not blame Amazon nor the seller for the problem in this particular case (first time ever).That aside, the new iPad is working nicely and has a great retina display (colors, graphics, resolution...) and great speed. But I still will not give it the fourth and fifth stars, because contrary to what I'm used, and expect, to get from Apple products, this one didn't have that mint condition look that I expected from and Apple's new item. Instead of going trough the process of returning with all the time delay and implications (customs in my country for once)I installed a anti-glare/mate screen protector to "hide" the scratch, which somehow defeats the purpose of the great retina displayIMPORTANT UPDATE: IOS 7 have a feature that cannot be turned of, which verifies that the Lightning connector is certified by Apple, and as soon as I update to IOS 7, and connected my iPad to be charged with the Lightning connector that came with the iPad in the original, brand new, sealed and unopened factory box I got a pop up display that stated that my iPad connector isn't certified and my not function properly with my iPad. I reported this to apple via chat support and the agent told me, after running an online diagnostic, that my device and connectors were new and that it was a glitch in the IOS 7 verifying routine that would be fixed on a next release (update of IOS 7), so I dismissed (every time) the message and charged my iPad without problems. But that was until today, after connecting the new iPad with the supposedly original Apple lightning connector and receiving the  warning message, the iPad stop charging after reaching 27% charge. Beware, either don't buy this model or wait until Apple issues some kind of correction or update removing that verifying routine from IOS 7. Right now for me, living outside the US this is a disaster, returning the device, for me is not an option. So I will have to take my iPad to a Venezuelan authorized service center, testing and probably buying a new "original" lightning connector, cause if I buy the Apple care plan in the US It won't be applicable in my country.

Reviews.Title: A welcome upgrade
Reviews.Author: Matthew P. Tebussek
Reviews.Content: This is definitely a welcome upgrade to my ipad 2 which hs served me well.  The retina display has twice the pixel density and makes text and pics crystal clear and sharp. Faster processor is nice as well.  If you don't like iOS then this is not for you. Don't listen to the negative reviews if those that do not like apple products. This is a solid piece if hardware from apple. Make sure you do your homework because a lot of the ones listed on here are more than you can buy them for new in the store.  They go for 399 new so don't be fooled.

Reviews.Title: Good iPad
Reviews.Author: Joshua
Reviews.Content: No scratches and was delivered on time and works great. Partner loves it and see lots of good use out of this like the majority of apple products

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: SLE
Reviews.Content: I bought this one to save money over the iPad air.  It allowed me to update the operating system for free once I synced it up to my computer, so it's just as good as the newer version.

Reviews.Title: Great Service
Reviews.Author: Paulette Lesane
Reviews.Content: I had been meaning to upgrade my iPad to 128GB for some time, but the prices were too high.  I found the best price on Amazon and received the item well before the EDD ( est. del. date).  My overall experience was exactly what I've come to expect from Amazon, Superb!  Thanks for the experience, Paulette.

Reviews.Title: I love this iPad
Reviews.Author: Regina M. Shirley
Reviews.Content: For the price, this is the iPad you want. I upgraded from an iPad 2 to this one. Very glad I did.

Reviews.Title: a brand new ipad
Reviews.Author: Haoqi
Reviews.Content: although it's called a used one, but it looks like a brand new one by all means. feel confident to buy.

Reviews.Title: Love it.
Reviews.Author: Acarsess
Reviews.Content: Bought this for my husband as a surprise for Christmas gift during the Black Friday promotion. It's a great product and because it came from an authorized Apple dealer, I was able to purchase Apple Care with no problem.  The iPad did not come with a SIM card which I thought it would have.  I contacted the vendor directly and got a response within a few hours of how to get one from AT&T.;  There was no charge for the SIM card.  My husband loves it!

Reviews.Title: Grandson thinks Grandpop is the best for getting him the iPad!
Reviews.Author: Thomas E. Curley
Reviews.Content: My grandson loves it. I got him this for Christmas and he has it with him every time he visits. Even takes it to bed. I got the 32GB model, since we learned with the iPod that 16GB doesn't hold much. The resolution on this model is unmatched. I bought it on Amazon cheap enough that I could get a 2 year "Drop N Break" Square Trade warranty, and still had money left over the retail prices.

Reviews.Title: IPad fourth edition
Reviews.Author: Janet R. Showers
Reviews.Content: You sent me a used one as a new one. Full of someone's info. Contacts etc. my grandson who is an IT wiped it clean and I kept it but was very disappointed!!!!

Reviews.Title: Winner
Reviews.Author: Adena
Reviews.Content: Love my iPad, however this need it has to just randomly close out of apps is rather annoying. Other than that the 4th generation was a great cheaper buy for me through Amazon, rather than buying the Air with just not enough differences!

Reviews.Title: IPad Purchase
Reviews.Author: ROBERT B KEMP
Reviews.Content: I already had an iPad but needed one for my wife.  Since I loaded mine up we only needed a slightly less robust unit and this does the trick

Reviews.Title: APPLE IPAD WITH RETINA DISPLAY
Reviews.Author: DIXIE BOYD
Reviews.Content: I LOVE IT AND IT WORKS GREAT. LOVE THAT IT COMES IN TWO COLORS ALSO. I WOULD RECOMEND THIS TO ANYONE.

Reviews.Title: Apple ipad with Fintie Black Folio Leather Cover
Reviews.Author: Sally Howard
Reviews.Content: make sure when you purchase your new ipad that you use square trade protection plan to protect your purchases .  Keep your ipad in the Finte Folio case cover to protect your investment.

Reviews.Title: Fantastic
Reviews.Author: capt gf pears
Reviews.Content: Bought for my 70 year old Mum and she loves it, easy to use and its got the 64gb memory too.

Reviews.Title: Battery runs down way too fast .....
Reviews.Author: Jeff N. Olsen "Seaeye"
Reviews.Content: Using as an alarm clock ... Start with 100% level at bedtime ... Battery dead before morning ... This Less than one week after purchase ...

Reviews.Title: Good but expensive...
Reviews.Author: AUGUSTO FIGUEIREDO "Augusto"
Reviews.Content: Heavier than predecessor. Battery is running fine. GPS is failing more than its predecessor lo locate and mantain the communication with satellites. Still working on that... Expensive and Apple could finally add at least a card reader or an USB port. iTUNES is a "monster" software.

Reviews.Title: Practically useless for your own creative work
Reviews.Author: E. Rabinovich
Reviews.Content: The function of Copy-Paste practically does not work, and I'd like to meet the  inventor of that feature to understand how he/she could seriously offer this invention to the buyer.  No buttons for navigation except deleting, in case of error you cannot put a cursor in the middle of a word to correct it but need to delete and to rewrite the entire word.Great for reading and communication though.Revised on 10-27-13.  Couple days ago we went to an Apple  store to see what we are doing wrong with Copy-Paste.  Nothing wrong, they could not do what I cannot do myself.  this feature is really terrible.

Reviews.Title: I am better than you !
Reviews.Author: David Feingold "@davidfeingold follow for rev...
Reviews.Content: Windows phone and Nexus phones. Nexus 7 tablet. Desktop Windows 8 and Linux servers.If you would have told me that I would own an iPad, I would have laughed, but I got it as a gift, so I'm definitly enjoying this, but first a few things.1) White sucks. Get black, pictures and video pops better.2) Don't just get a Smart Cover, get a smart case, so the back is protected.3) don't download a billion apps and if you enjoy a free app then buy the paid version. (it's only fair)As for the iPad itself.As I said, white wasn't the best choice, but it's still pretty cool. VERY heavy compared to Galaxy, but also feels much better built. The glass is smooth and slippery so it's easy to swipe around. The apps are the same, the only exception being that on Android, I could use 1Password for free and on the iPad they want 16 bucks. Needless to say I will no longer be purchasing from Agile Bits.The rest of the review.Meh.It's a tablet. You don't really need it, but it's cool to have.Oh yeah, it is a finger print magnet and do not use after eating Cheetos.

Reviews.Title: Kids Love them!!!
Reviews.Author: rich daniels
Reviews.Content: I bought two Ipads one daughter going off to the Navy & my other graduating with her Bachelor's Degree going on to get her Masters the Ipads are very nice a little pricey but the resistance to viruses for apple products was the final seller for me.  So far the kids love them and they work as described.  The seller was great and they arrived very quickly!!

Reviews.Title: Good for fun, not for work...
Reviews.Author: Judsiekitty
Reviews.Content: I think this is a good product just not really what I needed it for. It really doesn't do that much more than the iphone except the display is amazing, it takes really really nice pictures, and the sound is much better than an iphone. You really don't need extra speakers unless you are using it to listen to music and have a larger living space.I bought it because I work online and thought it would be nice and compact to work from but better than my iphone. I NEVER work on it. I mean I can check email and all of that but it's just not a laptop. I should have passed on this and gotten one of the thin little laptops instead.Also if you get one, get some kind of warranty and get a cover for it before it even arrives. It's more fragile than the iphone. I did not have a cover on my iphone when I first got it and dropped it a few times and it was fine. I was in the process of looking for a cover for this ipad and dropped it and the screen cracked. It's going to cost me at least $160 to get a new screen. The more protected it is the more places you will take it and the more use you will get out of it. I was at disney world's magic kingdom a few weeks ago and they have this amazing electric show at night. It looked like an ipad commercial. Everyone was holding up their ipads and recording it. But again I would be hesitant to haul it around without sufficient protection.So the graphics are amazing and it's a fun little gadget to watch movies or play games with.Oh I'm also in a few bible studies and the bible app is WAY better than on the iphone and you can also download books on kindle app. I do this with my bible study workbooks and you can fill it the blanks and answer questions and everything. The youtube app looks good.I'm not sure what else to say other than everything works and it's not defective. I just don't have a lot of money for "toys" so I wish I had gone with the laptop.

Reviews.Title: ipad with retina display
Reviews.Author: Fathi Jishi
Reviews.Content: This was a present for my son, so I did not use it my self. All I know is that he loves it.

Reviews.Title: Donating these to a church pre-school program.
Reviews.Author: Cecil Kessler
Reviews.Content: Apple is excellent bridge to from pre-school ages to formal schooling.  There are hundreds of apps for use with the Ipad which help teach pre-shoolers.  Great product.  Great potential.

Reviews.Title: 1st time iPad
Reviews.Author: EC505
Reviews.Content: We love how easy it was to use right out of the box.  Connected immediately to our wireless with minimal setup.  Gets a few hours use every day but only needs a charge after 3 or 4 days. Members of the family who swear they "hate technology" use more than anyone else because it is "so easy".

Reviews.Title: I LOVE this iPad
Reviews.Author: Michelle Burchfield
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my son for his 18th birthday along with a cover/keyboard.  I couldn't have purchased anything better for him to take off to college!

Reviews.Title: iPad/Technology Lover
Reviews.Author: S. Cook "Steel Magnolia"
Reviews.Content: Since I own an iPad 2nd generation (just gave to daughter), iPad Mini, iPhone, iPod, and Kindle Fire, I purchased this larger screen for camera upgrade, and use of DISH Anywhere, HBO GO, etc. for travel/cruising.  Hope the Wi-Fi/AT&T; feature will enable me to use on a cruise in our stateroom and not have to pay exorbitant prices in a "shared" computer room. Now my husband and I both, with our 2 upgraded iPads, can hopefully entertain ourselves when we travel.  Wanted also to have the most current w/128 GB and Wi-Fi + AT&T.;  Love it! However, I still find the data plan and the iCloud data confusing.  When I started this technology "journey," I would have like to have been told that, even after purchasing the product, there are other fees required, which run up the usage bill.Steel MagnoliaBeautiful Smoky Mts.Sevierville, TN

Reviews.Title: You can't go wrong with iPad!
Reviews.Author: f "f"
Reviews.Content: Listen to people who own other brand tablets. All they talk about is how their tablet is better than iPad. Now listen to and iPad owner…He is having a nice conversation with you asking about your day?. Wait. Why isn't he talking about other tablets?See what happened there?

Reviews.Title: iPad
Reviews.Author: Sporty1
Reviews.Content: We started with one of the top-rated android tablets, which is nice, but the iPad blows it away in many ways.  The iPad is so much easier to use and to figure out.  I still use the android, but only for a few applications.

Reviews.Title: I love it!
Reviews.Author: Joel Linarez
Reviews.Content: I love my new iPad. It has an excellent screen. I love the camera, in photos and vídeos the quality is great... At night pictures are not as good as in the day, but is ok...

Reviews.Title: Excellent picture quality
Reviews.Author: ElleS555
Reviews.Content: So far I have had it for about a month. I really enjoy watching videos and movies, excellent picture quality.

Reviews.Title: Awesome!!!
Reviews.Author: Soccergirl087
Reviews.Content: I just received this iPad yesterday (which was earlier than I was expecting), and I love it! It was easy to set up, and it's so much fun! Watching Netflix shows on this is so great, because everything is so clear! I just love this iPad.

Reviews.Title: Love, love it!
Reviews.Author: Debbie Stephenson
Reviews.Content: Another great Apple product. This is my second IPad and I love them both and use them on a daily basis.

Reviews.Title: Love My iPad!
Reviews.Author: Rose
Reviews.Content: I take it everywhere and it has met all my expectations.  It's not heavy at all to carry around and I have down-loaded all my aps and music.  So glad I got it for myself as a Christmas gift! LOL

Reviews.Title: Excelent hardware and software
Reviews.Author: Vitaly Chuban
Reviews.Content: I have bought iPaf 1 about three years ago, it was good. Now just few days ago I`ve bought iPad 4 (the maximum configuration), it is much faster, good screen resolution, my first impression is very good!

Reviews.Title: Simply the best tablet on the market
Reviews.Author: AppleSaucer "Paul"
Reviews.Content: The spectacular 9.7 inch Retina Display in Apple's full-size iPad is now matched with a custom System-on-Chip (SoC) that has the graphic muscle to take full advantage of its capabilities. The screen on this iPad is incredible! It totally blows away my HDTV.The 4th generation iPad also offers an overall speedier response than the 3rd generation model, along with the tiny new Lightning connector instead of a traditional 30-pin type. If you have a lot of peripherals that fit the older connector, you will need to a buy an adaptor if you want to keep using themI find myself using the iPad for roughly 80% of the activities that I used to do on my laptop. It is now my first choice for web browsing, and it is great for reading e-books. And it is more and more often my preferred way to watch movies and TV programs.Before buying, I compared this iPad to other high-quality tablets such as the 10-inch Nexus. As far as the displays go, the iPad was the clear winner. If the quality of the graphics is high on your list of priorities for a tablet, the 4th generation iPad is far and away the best choice.

Reviews.Title: Apple I-Pad 4
Reviews.Author: Dorinda Morpeth "POTTERSAILOR"
Reviews.Content: Gift for my husband, who had been drooling over his brother's I-Pad 3.  He loves it and it does everything he needs it to do.  I am not an Apple fan but if you are the nicer 64-bit is the way to go.Recommend

Reviews.Title: Awesome!
Reviews.Author: J. Meyers
Reviews.Content: This is my first iPad. I have used the previous generations (I work in IT). The retina display and thee processors (central and graphics) are awesome. The display is slick and smooth like water and amazingly clear. The response time is awesome. Videos are super clear in HD and games on this thing rock! The WiFi speeds are great. I am also using it for GarageBand which is like getting a portable recording studio for $5. I have traditionally been a Windows/Microsoft guy, but this thing just blows me away. I have several Andriod devices, which are very good too, but what this does, it does at a level that is unmatched. If you're thinking about buying and haven't used one much, just do it... you won't be sorry.

Reviews.Title: Great Resolution
Reviews.Author: H.T. R.
Reviews.Content: The screen resolution is great.  Readily connects to WiFI.  The cable connection is the same as the iPhone5 so don't order the wrong SD card adapter.

Reviews.Title: Fantastatic
Reviews.Author: claudio toppi
Reviews.Content: Even beter then expected, had nook this is by far much better. Crisper picture, great apps and easy to use. If you can spend the money go for it.

Reviews.Author: Ronald J. Davis
Reviews.Content: I can,t say enough about this ipad.  The ease of bringing up apps and the price was right on time.

Reviews.Title: Love it!!!!
Reviews.Author: Anne S.
Reviews.Content: I was pleasantly surprise when I received my IPad. I love it, especially with my grandson. I will definitely do business with this company again.

Reviews.Title: too many  problems
Reviews.Author: C. Donath "reader"
Reviews.Content: could not download my apps and over 300 books from older i-pad, kept getting waiting on all items, even after 24 hurs of being charged. finally got frustrated and sent the unit back to the shipper this monday. apple tech support would not work with me becdause the original pad was sold in march, i assume to my shipper.  will buy a new i-pad direct from apple as soon as my account is credited by the prvious shipper

Reviews.Title: Still connected to previous owners iCloud.
Reviews.Author: Jennie
Reviews.Content: This purchase was a huge disappointment for me. It arrived extremely fast, which was great, it was in excellent condition for a used iPad. The problem lies in the fact that iPads are not checked to make sure they are no longer connected to the previous owners iCloud account. In the event this happens there is absolutely no way to use the iPad (I tried everything) which makes it a huge disappointment. Especially since this was the second one I purchased (the other was from another seller) that arrived "locked". Although I had a terrible experience with this item customer service was quick, friendly, and I received a full refund as soon as they received the item back. So it could've ended worse I suppose. My daughter had to wait an additional two weeks after her birthday for her iPad (which I purchased new in a store) but everything is ok now.

Reviews.Title: Doa
Reviews.Author: Alwin le Febre
Reviews.Content: I receive it Dead On Arrival.The Amac store in the Netherlands replaced it for a new one. It's a great new iPad4 retina!

Reviews.Title: love it
Reviews.Author: aliciabuenaventura
Reviews.Content: I love this apple ipad 4th generation  and 32GB,perfectly for student who study and easy to carry anywhere ,the size is perfect not to big not too small ,i can recommended this apple ipad.

Reviews.Title: Awesome
Reviews.Author: danzante
Reviews.Content: My Granddaughter has an Ipad (same as this one only in black) and she loves it and kept showing me all the nice features she could do with hers.  I finally broke down and bought this one as the price was excellent and I'm thrilled with it. It meets my expectations.  The color of the pictures are absolutely beautiful, great resolution. Everything works perfectly. Just wish it had a USB slot or someway you could add memory, I'm sure Apple will figure that out, eventually.  I'm happy that I can access my Vudu movies and Ultra Violet. I'm a senior and find the Ipad easy to use.  Wish I hadn't waited so long to make up my mind.

Reviews.Title: It's No Secret
Reviews.Author: Dr. Kenneth P. Freeman
Reviews.Content: This is the 4th generation iPad.  With all that has been written and spoken about it, and from experiences with others' tablets, there is little to add in yet another review.  It works, it's beautiful, and does what we knew it would.

Reviews.Title: MINI?
Reviews.Author: marie lewis
Reviews.Content: The mini arrived and used 2-3 days then returned for full refund to put toward an Ipad w/ret. Mini way to small for my 60+ eyes. The service was very commendable with regards to the purchase and return. Amazon 2 day is remarkable. The $80+ per year is worth every penny!

Reviews.Title: The Air Came Out and I'm Still Thrilled With the One I Have
Reviews.Author: John P. Thiel "John P. Thiel"
Reviews.Content: It's termed the iPad 4 but technically it's the iPad 6.I bought this particular model several months after its release at an AT&T; store in a mall.  They had it in stock, so I was thrilled with the fact that I could walk out of the store on my lunch break with a fully functioning new iPad.  I'm a sucker for picking things up in person, unless it means waiting on a line with people who think they are 'making history' with their purchase, in which case I just have it shipped to me at home or work, most likely from Amazon.This is my first iPad.  I held off on buying one because I'm a film geek and wanted a full HD display.  When Apple came out with the Retina Display, I thought, "That's great, but with a maximum of 64GB it's still just a toy.  I need at least 120GB."  And then they came out with a 128GB model plus a better port and it was time to buy.  All my friends who rushed to buy the first iPad, the iPad 2, and 'The New iPad' as the 3rd generation model was called were definitely jealous; but more important for me was that I got exactly what I wanted.In fact I was so happy with getting exactly what I wanted that when the iPad Air came out, a little faster and lighter than the one I bought, it didn't make a difference to me.  Sure, I'm looking forward to when Apple comes out with what I predict will be a larger, more powerful, fully functioning computer in iPad form--and I'm predicting it will be called the iPad Pro--but even then I'll probably wait until at least the next generation of that model before buying it unless it features the ability to use Final Cut Pro (which no current iPad can do).Will you regret buying this one instead of the iPad Air or waiting for the next model?  I don't think so.  First thing, it's nearly as powerful as the iPad Air, and if you wait for the next model you're going to pay top dollar.  If you wait for the price to drop, then you're going to want the model after that.  And the cycle of suffering on this matter is endless.When you're ready to buy, then buy.  Buy the one you want.  This one versus the Air, personally I think the only significant difference is price, that you're not missing something.  Just make sure to buy it new from an authorized Apple dealer.

Reviews.Title: 4/5 stars I'd give more but the scratches are more and missing apple logo makes it 4
Reviews.Author: Jacob Stanfield
Reviews.Content: Decent, I'm happy but not 5 stars.4/5 stars I'd give more but the scratches are more and missing apple logo makes it 4

Reviews.Title: Didn't work for the way I wanted.
Reviews.Author: Jerry Jennings
Reviews.Content: It arrived when it was supposed to in good condition. I was disappointed in how the Mac O/S works and pushes you thru Istore on everything and ITunes works differently on the IPD.

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: dtobisk
Reviews.Content: I received the original version of the iPad in Dec 2010 and used it happily for nearly 3 years, then noticed that performance seemed to be getting slower and that many new apps were not compatible with the old operating system, which could not be updated. This new iPad has proven many times faster than the old one, and its other features (latest OS, cameras, Siri, etc) made it a very worthwhile purchase. I use it several times every day. It may not be the iPad Air (which was announced just a week or so after I ordered this), but it's still a great item.

Reviews.Title: i should have bought it a long time ago!
Reviews.Author: Gertrude G.
Reviews.Content: I LOVE it!, i spend time on it every day, the best investment i ever made, thanks for asking, my first ipad

Reviews.Title: A wonderful surprise.
Reviews.Author: John Pinker
Reviews.Content: I've had a lot of enjoyment it came quickly works great what else can I say it fulfills all my needs does what I expected to and it was in great shape thank you very much. My first time with the Apple product and it has been an enjoyable one what a surprise.

Reviews.Title: Worth every Penni
Reviews.Author: A4MULLA
Reviews.Content: Amazing tabletRetina display is more than you can ask for.  If your seeking a tablet to buy you can't go wrong with apple.  It's a sure thing

Reviews.Title: Apple iPad 4
Reviews.Author: Paris D. Willis "paris dwight willis"
Reviews.Content: An updated version of the iPad.  4th. Generation.  Works well like all earlier versions. User friendly.  Love it! Get yours now. They are being discounted now. Were more costly during Xmas holidays.

Reviews.Title: Love this ipad
Reviews.Author: Amazon purchases
Reviews.Content: Great image display, lots of storage, cellular data is a huge plus. Now that I have it I can't live without it.

Reviews.Title: Works great
Reviews.Author: Jeffrey Tusing
Reviews.Content: Works as expected. This was a Christmas present for my wife, I also have an older iPad and both are in constant use and work great.

Reviews.Title: the gift that keeps giving
Reviews.Author: T. Weller
Reviews.Content: I gave this to my husband a year ago, he calls it his mistress... he doesn't go anywhere without it, it's a great baby sitter :)

Reviews.Title: Thank you for the new ipad
Reviews.Author: Jim Brunner
Reviews.Content: Got this iPad worked for three days then  died.  The seller had said it still had a warranty till end of Feb 2014.  Taken to the apple store found out it did have one. They however could not fix it so they gave me a brand new one out of the box. So thank you for the great deal.

Reviews.Title: You gotta like Apple
Reviews.Author: PL Customer
Reviews.Content: Turns out, I'm not a fan. Its a lot easier to use than a laptop on trips and it makes it easier to check email while drinking coffee in the morning, but that's about all. The volume is terrible and so its not much use for watching movies. The notebook function is nice though.

Reviews.Title: Jb
Reviews.Author: Jon Bayer "jon"
Reviews.Content: No problems, not very sturdy compared to the other one that was purchased. This was still a good functioning product.

Reviews.Title: Everything Came in Perfect Condition!
Reviews.Author: puzzle breaker
Reviews.Content: I ordered a new iPad 4gen with retina display by "Direct Cell Source" and that is exactly what came in. Also the delivery came in much faster then said. As of now the iPad is working fabulously with no signs of being used and no scratches. I am amazed with ipad 4 gen performance and the shipping speed from "Direct Cell Source". I recommend buying an iPad 4gen with retina display by "Direct Cell Source" to anyone thinking about buying a type of iPad.

Reviews.Title: What's the point of these again?
Reviews.Author: John J. Hannon "hern2000"
Reviews.Content: My wife wanted this for Christmas so we got one. I don't see the value in them, frankly. At this point your phone will do everything that one of these does. I guess if you're vision impaired I can see the value, but for an average person these seem like a complete waste of money to me. It works great, Apple always makes a solid product, but is it something anyone needs? No.

Reviews.Title: iPad = Awesome
Reviews.Author: Joe K.
Reviews.Content: I've been an Apple user since 1st gen iphone. The touch screen and responsiveness on apple products is unbeatable. This iPad is wonderful and I won't even give a second glance at an android device until their screen responsiveness is improved. I have one for myself and I bought one for a friend for christmas. Highly recommended.

Reviews.Title: Excellent Quality
Reviews.Author: Shaina Cochrane
Reviews.Content: Lets face it, you buy Apple products at their ridiculously high price because it's a quality item. Safari is an wasting Internet browser to use and, while you can't customize settings as much as a laptop computer, it has excellent malware protection and is set up very conveniently for the casual browser. It's a good weight too. While shopping for my tablet, I've looked at and held many other brands. A common problem (for me) is that a lot of them felt too light for their size. This is probably because apple uses aluminum for the back cover of their tablet instead of plastic. It feels sturdy, and that's a good thing when it comes to durability. Another excellent apple quality? The apps! I know, other tablets have apps too, but apple has kind of cornered the market on app production. Most of what you can find on an android or kindle tablet, you can find in the apple store (and then some). See an app not available through apple? Probably a good thing! I've learned that Apple screens all of their apps before putting it up in the store. This means that there are no major malware problems. There are some disadvantages of course: 1- you have to buy directly from apple as they do have monopoly on their stuff and a lot of imitation items are suspect (this can get pricey), 2- you can't really open two screens the way you can simultaneously on other devices. This is not to say that you can't have two (or more) things running at once, but you have to switch entirely between them and can't view both on the screen at once. 3- there are many conveniently pre-downloaded onto other tablets that are very useful for students and office work. You can get a lot of those same apps through the apple store, but many of the better ones are not free and you have to pick and choose your way through quite a few applications.There are probably more then 3, but these are the ones that stood out to me. Overall though, PROs totally outweigh the CONs, making this tablet just plain awesome! (So awesome that my best friend saved started saving up for one right after mine came in the mail.)

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: apollo
Reviews.Content: This review will be very brief and basic; there are other great reviews out there that really dive into the in's and out's of this particular product.I love it!  Just like my relationship with my smartphone, don't leave home without it.  Crystal clear on graphics.  Of course, this is my first ipad so I cannot really compare it on past experience.  Tons of apps, batteries lasts ok.  100% can last for about a day (I actually used it for about an hour every hour, and by about 9-930 pm, battery was at 15%.  Again, depending on what you are doing, it lasted me for about 2 more hours (I think).Price was great!  Seller was AWESOME (they actually gave me a cover for this ipad as a token of appreciation for the business).  However, with that being said, if you have kids that always run around, MAKE SURE TO INVEST on a more "military" style case.  If you call Apple, the only thing that they could suggest was..., well sir, just buy a new one??!?  (yeah, like I have $500 bucks, spewing out from my pockets.  My response; okay let me go to my money tree and pick some bills out, goodbye!  If you go to an electronics store, make sure to have at least $200 laying around.  I broke/cracked my screen after 2 weeks!  So needless to say, a case with something covering the actual screen, yes it is a must!  No flash, no usb port, but takes good pictures and speakers are good as well.Item was shipped fast, very fast!  Definitely ordering from this person again!

Also have a Nexus 7 and Nook HD+.  No one table is a do all like my Asus 1215B 12" laptop. Reviews.Title: Delivered in perfect condition, unopened. Seller is legit!
Reviews.Author: Poo-Jangles
Reviews.Content: My iPad was delivered to me in perfect condition, completely unopened and it works very well. Having said that, I wish I did not buy an iPad that was stuck to Sprint because I cannot get the internet anywhere. Instead, I ended up buying a Jetpack from Verizon and paying $45 a month so I can have internet access.Also, iPads are apparently useless for Accounting students. It's great for games and entertainment but the apps for Business and Accounting are expensive and unreliable. I will be giving my iPad to my little brother and buying a Google Nexus tablet when I finish paying off the money I owe Amazon for my useless iPad.This seller definitely gave me what I asked for and in perfect condition, which is the only reason I gave 3 stars.

Reviews.Title: good

I do not know much about these toys but one thing I did notice that is a pain is that the screen will flip/rotate depending on how you are holding it.  I understand why it does that but I wish there was some way to disable that.  Sometimes when I am laying down reading an ebook on the iPad the screen is constantly rotating and I am constantly having to change my body position.  Super annoying.

Reviews.Title: Less Than Expected For Apple Product
Reviews.Author: Bob B
Reviews.Content: The touch screen of the iPad does not work well using a finger, so a capacitive stylus is a must have and Apple does not provide one with the iPad. Battery operating time on a single charge is extraordinary! Manual switches on the sides of the iPad are difficult to operate, especially with a cover on the iPad. The cost of a cover for the iPad is extremely high, and they are not well thought out designs. The iPad is not a replacement for a laptop, but it is very convenient for travel. I like the big screen. Safari, an app, is clumsy to use. Google history is much more convenient. The History app gives you excellent TV programing.

Reviews.Title: IPad equipment and response
Reviews.Author: Norman H. Carter
Reviews.Content: The Apple " i,Pad" performed  as promised. The situation here is that the project was  for a  cliernt for which we were going  to use it it did not come throughWe were disappointed (Upset!) as the contract was quite large.. I see no replacement in the next half year.at the soonest. So have returned both units to Amazon for refund.Another surprise when  two packages arrived not just the  one I thought  I had ordered. I am a computer  "Luddite"  So I may have screwed up. and ordered  second one from Amazon. I  returned  both machine on the same UPS bill also.  Both machines were  in "mint condition" when  picked up by our local UPS. When another project comes our way  we will purchase from Amazon. You  have met our expectations and given very good  Customer Service.Regrets, Norman H. Carter

Reviews.Title: Only because of jailbrake I can say I like the Ipad
Reviews.Author: Javier Puche
Reviews.Content: Mac products are stylish and well made, but software is a limitation. This is my first mac product since I have an smarth phone with android and a toshiba laptop. Hardware on this Ipad has good performance, it has good quality screen and the processor is fast opeming apps and navigating. What I did not like is all the restrictions that one as an user has when interacting with another brand devices and even with file management. I am tech savy maybe what I am writing is not relevant for other kind of users, but I like to get full use of the things I buy. For example with ipad bluetooth sharing can only be made between mac devices. File management non existant, just media folders, among other things. This is what made me give jailbrake a try. After installing it and experiment all alternative apps it offers I felt l in heaven, now I could say that the Ipad was mine, it was freedom. If it wasnt for cydia I would have sell  the ipad for sure and go to a samsung tablet.

This has the exact look, features, crappy OS and shackling to Itunes as the Ipad I already have, there is no incentive or need to buy this.
